Short: This is my personal Mastodon server, with a few extra people on it.

Description:
Un spectre hante l’Internet

Ce réseau fait partie d’une fédération de sites utilisant le logiciel Mastodon et communicant entre eux: le Fediverse. On y agit telle une communauté politique, ayant le souci du débat, de la solidarité, et de s’extraire des services centralisés capitalistes[^1].

Plan quinquennal

On utilise l’orthographe inclusive, et c’est mieux si c'est avec un point médian (·) mais au fond tu fais comme tu veux tant que tu comprends que le masculin n’est pas épicène en français.

On apprécie aussi la correction typographique, mais on ne te le fera pas remarquer parce que la langue est un outil de domination.

Tu n’es pas chez toi, donc tu ne t’essuies pas les pieds sur la table du salon.

Politburo

Ne seront pas toléré·e·s :

  • Les menaces
  • Le harcèlement
  • Le sexisme
  • Le racisme

Si ça te déplait, va te trouver de vrais problèmes ailleurs, personne ne t’oblige à rester.

Commissariat du peuple aux Finances

La location du serveur coûte environ 16 € par mois. Aidez-moi à soutenir la dépense pour garder un fonctionnement optimal.

Serveurs

  • Hetzner CPX21, pour l’exécution du programme et le stockage des bases de données : 8,5305 € par mois
  • Wasabi, pour le stockage des médias : environ 6 € par mois, variable en fonction du trafic enregistré

Nom de domaine

  • Enregistré chez Gandi
  • Coûte 14,52 € par an

Coût

  • Annuel : environ 192 €
  • Mensuel : environ 16 €

Financement du parti

Si tu veux participer librement au financement du serveur, de l’espace de stockage ou du nom de domaine, voici des solutions de cotisation

  • Liberapay
  • PaypalMe

[^1]: Le capitalisme crée des monopoles, il ne les dépasse jamais. Une seule solution, la socialisation des moyens de production.

Mastodon.land

A small community of folks from Cleveland, OH.

Posts and topics are not limited to Cleveland
Short: Cleveland, OH community.

Description:
Migennes ?

Vous vous trouvez sur l'instance Mastodon de Migennes, un réseau informatique géré sur notre temps libre. L'instance est maintenue par @papaeng89.

Le serveur se trouve à Migennes et utilise la bande passante de SCANI.

Quelques règles

De manière générale, les utilisateurs de cette instance sont invités à respecter la Netiquette (telle que décrite dans la RFC 1855).

Les contenus NSFW sont autorisés seulement s'ils sont taggés comme tels et légaux en France, de même que les spoilers pouettés doivent l'être sous Content Warning explicite. Il est souhaitable que chacun tente, dans la mesure du possible, de ne pas flooder, notamment sur les timelines publiques.

La liberté des uns s'arrête là où commence celle des autres. Si quelqu'un empiète sur la vôtre, vous pouvez le bloquer et/ou le signaler aux administrateurs, qui se chargeront, avec l'avis de la communauté, de prendre les mesures nécessaires.

Nous aider

L'accès à l'instance est gratuit et le restera
topic: Le réseau social pour les Migennois

Description:
WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.

You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website.

Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.

General Usage

Accounts on mastodon.acc.umu.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own? :)

We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):
(in English) (i Svenska)

You may not post (or boost/repost):

  • material illegal under Swedish laws
  • material against the rules of SUNET
  • material in breach of the copyright act
  • material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

Code of Conduct

Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

Reporting an issue

For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

For content or abuse issues:

  • if you're a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
  • If you're not a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".

    • For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

    Privacy

    ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

    Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

    Federation

    mastodon.acc.umu.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

    Currently not federating with: none

    In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions and content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

    Currently silenced:

    • pawoo.net (no media)
    • switter.at (no media)

    Last updated: 2018-03-29
Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Hinaloe (@hnle0) の実験的インスタンス。

日本国法内でおねがいします。詳しくは、このインスタンスについてをご覧ください。

Code of Conduct

This is a small private instance for a group of friends. We expect our local users to act in good faith and follow the server rules when interacting with folks both local and remote.

If you do something shitty that isn't explicitly mentioned in the rules, you may still be given a warning, have your post removed, be silenced from the public timeline, or have your account suspended at an administrator's discretion.

Users on remote servers who violate our local rules may be silenced from our public timeline or suspended from interacting with anyone on our server at an administrator's discretion.

Privacy Advisory

Public and unlisted posts on this server are visible to the public, and could be searched, archived, or otherwise made available by third parties via the wider internet. The administrator of this server cannot prevent this.

Followers-only posts are delivered only to your followers and cannot be boosted. However, if one of your followers is untrustworthy or their home server is using buggy software, they could (accidentally or maliciously) expose your followers-only posts. We recommend all users monitor their followers and remove anyone they don't want to see their followers-only posts. If you are posting sensitive followers-only content, it is best to lock your account so you can manually approve all followers.

Custom Emoji Licensing

This instance makes use of the following third party emoji sets:

  • The Mutant Standard emoji are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

We have other emoji copied from remote servers, for which the license is unknown. If you see us using an emoji you created and would like it acknowledged here, please contact the administrator via direct message with the emoji shortcode and link to the creator/license terms.

教育学習とICT関係に集う人達のマストドンです。
Education & Learning with ICT で「ELICT」になってます。

GIGAスクール構想を経て，「情報活用能力育成」「情報教育」「共通教科・情報」「プログラミング教育」「EdTech」「教育データ」など教育や学びにおけるICT／テクノロジーの活用に関して私たちが話題交換する場を提供します｡

2017年4月より開設された数少ない教育関係のマストドン・インスタンスです。

教育や学習，教育とテクノロジーに関わる事柄に関心のある皆さんのご参加歓迎します。登録についてはオープンにしていますのでお気軽に。
（フリーメールサービスを使ったメールアドレスで登録できない場合があります｡ごめんなさい。）

インスタンスは助言を得ながら試行錯誤して運営し、利用実態や報告等に応じて各種事案に対応していきたいと考えています。管理は最善を尽くします。利用者の皆様でも各自でセキュリティ対策はお忘れなきようお願い申し上げます。
教育ICTの分野が盛り上がる一助になりますよう。

Description:
Welcome to The Clacks

Named after the transcontinental communications network from Terry Pratchett's Discworld.

Neither Deluge Nor Ice Storm Nor The Black Silence Of The Netherhells Shall Stay These Messengers About Their Sacred Business. Do Not Ask Us About Sabre-Tooth Tigers, Tar Pits, Big Green Things With Teeth, Or The Goddess Czol.

Follow @tithonium for status updates, planned downtimes, upgrade announcements, etc.

Description:
三浦半島インスタンスとしてゆる～く運用中。そうは言っても「三浦半島」のキーワードで強く縛るつもりはまったくありません。基本的にどなたでも歓迎します。

ただしワリとガバ運用なのでインスタンスなので突然消滅することや、データが吹っ飛ぶこと、サーバーが落ちることもあると思います。

あまりこのインスタンスに依存しないように、いつでも別のインスタンスから再出発できるように……そんな心づもりで自由に遊んでください。

インスタンス管理人も素人なので、勉強しながら遊んでみたいと思ってます。ぱお～ん。

"Tekkadon" is Mastodon instance for community of around the Miura Peninsula, Kanagawa, Japan. However, even if you are unrelated to the Miura Peninsula, you are OK. Basically anyone can join. Welcome to Tekkadon!

But "Tekkadon" is driving slowly and loosely. Server down or data lose may occur. Suddenly "Tekkadon" may disappear. Please be ready at any time to be able to start again in another Mastodon instance.

Tekkadon administrator is also one of the beginners who want to learn while enjoying Mastodon.

Let's enjoy with us, Pawooooooooooooooooon!
Short: ゆるく三浦半島インスタンス、まったり運用中。

Description:
Shamelessly borrowed with permission from Kitty.Town

As a user of RedWombat.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from RedWombat.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admins.

Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.


The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

  • Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Admins)
  • Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
  • Untagged gore and graphic violence
  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from RedWombat.social.

This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.
  • Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.
  • Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

This Code of Conduct applies both to content on RedWombat.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing RedWombat.social or its community.

Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

The Admins reserve the right to revoke any user's content on or access to RedWombat.social, at any time, for any reason.

Land Acknowledgement

We recognize and honour that coales.co is physically hosted and managed in Moh’kinsstis on Treaty 7 Territory, the traditional homeland of the Siksika, Kainai, Piikani, Iyarhe Nakoda and Tsuut’ina Nations as well as Region 3 of the Metis Nation.

Code of Conduct

Site administration reserves the right to suspend or remove users that do not behave in a civil manner. Specific guidelines are being further developed and will be placed here as the site develops.

Inappropriate Content

Users who post inappropriate content will be suspended after a warning. Repeat offenders will be permanently banned.

  • Advertisements of any kind without the express written permission of site administration are PROHIBITED. Please ask permission before posting anything of a commercial nature
  • Bots are allowed only if they do not clutter the timeline or engage with other users without their permission. Please contact site administration before using bots to be sure they are appropriate!
  • Content that is considered obscene, libelous, hate speech or otherwise unlawful under Canadian law will be removed immediately and the user who posted it banned without warning
  • Personal attacks, derogatory remarks or discriminatory behaviour towards others based on ANY personal characteristics will not be tolerated!
  • Accounts that mislead or misrepresent the true identity of a user will be banned immediately (no fake celebrities allowed unless the profile explicitly states it is fake!)
  • Harassment, bullying or otherwise inciting hatred against others is prohibited
  • Users are responsible for vetting articles/links they post or share. Users who deliberately and repeatedly post "fake news" without stating it is as such will be suspended or banned.

Content Warnings

The Mastodon platform offers a "content warning" feature that obscures post content until a user explicitly opens it. This allows for sensitive information or potentially offensive or distressing content to be hidden from those who do not wish to see it. The following should be placed within content warnings:

  • Any level of violence, nudity or sexual content that would be deemed higher than a "PG" rating
  • Anything that would be considered a "spoiler" when discussing popular movies, television shows, sporting events or current events
  • Sensitive topics which may incite excessively heated arguments. Keep in mind that healthy lively discussion is encouraged and users are NOT expected to conceal everything that might be the slightest bit disagreeable!

Blocked Instances

Users of this instance are encouraged to use self moderation to silence and block at a user level. However as the federated Web grows there may be clear cases where an entire instance is clearly engaging in questionable behaviour. Instance level silencing and suspensions on this instance are implemented on an "as need" or complaint basis as their content appears in this instance's timelines, and on occasion preemptively based on others' block lists after manual review by administrators if deemed appropriate. That said reports WILL be taken seriously and required actions will be taken swiftly

Description: おやくそく/ ひとがいやがることはしない/ 陰でこっそり誰かの悪口言わない/相手を尊重する
An instance for cuties
Eingeschränkte Instanz der ctseuro.com. Bitte verwenden Sie https://joinmastodon.org um einen Account anzulegen!

Présentation française

Biscuit.town (ou Enbyscuit Town) est une petite instance liée aux mouvements féministe, queer et lgbt+. 

Cette instance a été créée pour et par des personne handis, queers, féministes et gauchistes.  On a de tout chez nous et surtout des camarades pour parler, se serrer les coudes, être attentionné.e.s et respectueux.se.s les un.e.s envers les autres. 

Ici, vous trouverez un endroit qui espère rendre plus agréable votre quotidien sur internet, en se protégeant autant que possible des fachos. Cette espace ne sera évidemment pas toujours positif, vous pouvez parler de vos problèmes et de sujets sérieux, en respectant les règles de l'instance. 

Inscription

L'instance héberge principalement des personnes francophones pour l'instant. Vous pouvez parler la langue que vous préférez, mais cela reste la langue principale de l'instance. Nous pouvons modérer uniquement en français et en anglais.

Les inscriptions sont vérifiées à la main, cela peut parfois prendre quelques jours! Merci d'écrire une petite phrase, le but est juste de vérifier que vous êtes un humain, et si vous sentiriez bien ici.    

Modération 

L'équipe d'administration modère selon les règles données plus bas. Si vous pensez que nous avons fait une erreur ou que l'équipe de modération de votre instance a changé depuis cette décision, vous pouvez nous contacter et nous choisirons la nouvelle marche à suivre.

L'équipe d'administration et modération est constituée de :

  • Sapphaos
  • Moino
  • Tag 

Cette équipe s'assure de la modération de façon bénévole.

Nous modérons contre le racisme, le sexisme, la queerphobie, le harcèlement de façon active, en particulier en suivant le hashtag fediblock. Nous essayons de prévenir au mieux les blocages d'instance avant que cela ai des répercussions négatives pour les utilisateurices de cette instance. 

Mastodon permet de choisir quels hashtags en tendance nous affichons. Afin de cultiver une ambiance la moins anxiogène possible, nous avons choisi de n'afficher qu'une sélection de hashtags qui n'encourageras pas à "doomscroller" comme cela peut être le cas sur Twitter. Par exemple, s'il y a dans l'actualité une agression ou une guerre, le hashtag lié ne sera pas affiché en tendance.

Émojis

Cette instance utilise des emojis Mutant Standard  créés par Dzuk, licenciés sous  Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License .   

Règlement      

  • Ne participez à aucune forme d'oppression. Racisme, sexisme, queerphobie, validisme, psyvalidisme, grossophobie... Toute incitation à la haine, harcèlements, dogpilling, diffamations sera punie.
  • Utilisez autant que possible les CW pour des sujets potentiellement sensible pour les utilisateurices. Par exemple, cela peut concerner la violence, la politique, les discours haineux (quand on réfère à ceux ci)... Vous pouvez aussi des CW en temps que spoiler pour parler de films ou de jeux.
  • Le contenu NSFW (nudité, pornographie) est autorisé uniquement lorsqu'il est accompagné d'un CW et marqué comme sensible.  
  • Ne harcelez personne : n'envoyez pas de haine ciblée à quelqu'un, d'attaques répétées à une personne spécifique, ne participez pas à des harcèlements de masse.
  • Évitez les réglements de comptes en public. Si vous avez un problème avec un⋅e utilisateur⋅ice, essayez de le régler en privé ou contactez l'équipe de modération. Les subtoot intempestifs sont interdits.  
  • Vos « retoots » (boost) doivent respecter ces règles si possible.  

English presentation

Biscuit.town (or Enbyscuit Town) is a small instance linked to the feminist, queer and lgbt+ movements. 

It was created for and by disabled, queer, feminist and leftist people.  We have everything here and especially comrades to talk to, to stick together, to be caring and respectful to each other. 

Here you will find a place that hopes to make your daily life on the internet more pleasant, while protecting yourself as much as possible from the fascists. This space will obviously not always be positive, you can talk about your problems and serious topics, respecting the rules of the instance. 

Registration

The instance hosts mainly French speaking people for the moment. You can speak the language you prefer, but it remains the main language of the instance. We can only moderate in French and English.

Registrations are verified by hand, it may take a few days! Please write a short sentence, the purpose is just to check if you are a human, and if you would feel comfortable here.    

Moderation 

The moderation team moderates according to the rules given below. If you think we have made a mistake or that the moderation team for your instance has changed since this decision, you can contact us and we will decide on a new course of action.

The moderation team consists of :

  • Sapphaos 
  • Moino
  • Tag

This team takes care of the moderation on a voluntary basis.

We moderate against racism, sexism, queerphobia, harassment in an active way, in particular by following the hashtag fediblock. We try to prevent instance blocking as much as possible before it has negative repercussions for the users of that instance. 

Mastodon allows you to choose which trending hashtags we display. In order to cultivate a less anxiety-provoking atmosphere, we have chosen to display only a selection of hashtags that will not encourage "doomscrolling" as it can be the case on Twitter. For example, if there is an assault or war in the news, the related hashtag will not be displayed as a trend.

Emojis

This instance uses Mutant Standard emojis  created by Dzuk, licenced under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License .
Short: Biscuit.town est une instance par et pour les personnes neuroqueer, féministes et gauchistes.

Description: A Pleroma instance, an alternative fediverse server

詳細説明

・アカウントを作りたいときは


改定(2019-02-17)

このサーバーは個人サーバーとなります。
一時的な措置として、ここのサーバーに入りたい方は私がフォローしている方に限らせて頂きます。
もし入りたい方は、ここにアカウントをお持ちの方に相談をして頂ければと思います。私のフォローがされたら、私にも再度、こちらに入りたい旨を伝えて頂き、伝えていただいた後に、後述する文章を考えていただければと思います。
ここにアカウントをお持ちの方は、お手数ですが、入りたい人が居る旨を伝えて頂ければと思います。
フォローの判断については明言をしませんのでご了承下さい。
現在felesitas.cloud用のフォームを製作を企画中です。

改定(2019-02-17)の最後

1.まず初めに、このインスタンスをどのような考えを持って運用していきたいかが記述されているので、利用規約・プライバシーポリシーを必ず読んで下さい。

2.他のインスタンスにアカウントを持っていないならば、他のインスタンスにまず登録をお願いします。

3.このインスタンスのAdminに、作成したマストドンのアカウントから連絡して下さい。

4.利用規約・プライベートポリシー、詳細説明のページそれぞれを読まれたかどうか確認しますので、質問に答えるようにして下さい。

5.確認ができたら、「あなたの好きなものは何か、その好きなものについて、どのように自分は好きなのか、またはなぜそれが好きなのか」を、最低500字以上の文章で書いて、Adminか、このインスタンスの中にアカウントを持っている方に送付して見てもらって下さい。（メンション分ける必要あり）

6.Adminに送付した時、その内容が好きだと感じたら、新規アカウント開設のための処理を行います。
Admin以外のアカウントに送ったら、Admin以外のアカウントは、新規アカウント希望者の500字以上の文と、その内容が好きか好きでないかを、Adminに送付して下さい。
Adminが判断して新規アカウント開設のための処理を行います。


なぜこのようなことを行うかについて、また、その他利用規約等については、利用規約・プライベートポリシーをご一読下さい。


運営の方針

このインスタンスは、個人で運営にかかる費用を払って運営しております。（勉強のため、娯楽のため）
どこかの組織や企業に運営の一部、または全部を任せることは考えておりません。
その弊害として、アップデート作業の合間等、意図せずインスタンスが利用不可能になる恐れがあります。ご了承下さい。
また、個人での管理のため、利用規約や日本法に抵触する投稿が管理者の目の届かないところにあるかもしれません。そのようなときは、該当する投稿をAdminまで報告していただければと思います。
また、サブドメインで何か別のサービスを立ち上げる可能性はありますが、紹介は行いますが、参加を強制させることはありません。

解説
趣味で所持しているだけです！なので御大層なことは考えておりません！
サブドメインで面白いこと出来たら良いなと考えていますが、参加を強制するものではないです。でも、マストドンに限らず、もっと楽しくしていけたらいいなぁとは常々考えています。


このインスタンス内の投稿の権利ライセンス

このインスタンス内部のアカウントによるオリジナルの投稿（トゥート内容、画像、曲、動画その他、アカウント所持者自身が作成し、投稿したもの）のライセンスは、このインスタンス内の各アカウントを保持している方に帰属します。
アカウントの個別の投稿、プロフィール表記、ピン留めトゥート、またはそれらのリンク先に、投稿についてのライセンス表記が明示的になされていなければ、この内容は、インスタンス内のアカウントの投稿全てに適応できるものとします。

解説
ｎ次転載や、他人の文章をコピーして自分のアカウントで投稿すること以外の一次的著作物に関しては、このインスタンス内では、そのアカウント所持者自身に著作権があるとします。
各個人のアカウントが明示しない限り、他サイト等に、このインスタンス内のアカウントの投稿を無断で転載することを禁止します。各アカウントに了承を取ってからにして下さい。

メンテナンスについて
現在メモリの使用量が増えるに従い、インスタンスが落ちる事態が発生しています。
対処法として、システムを、毎週火曜日と土曜日の午前10時に再起動するように設定してあります。10時付近で繋がりにくい場合、リロードし、しばらくお待ち下さい。

もし、利用規約・プライバシーポリシーを未だご覧になっていない場合、こちらをご覧ください。

このサイトでの絵文字について
MEGAMOJI　カスタム絵文字メーカーを一部で使用しています。

Good night, Good dream. 良い夢を。

このサーバーとの通信をされる方へ

このサーバーは、一部のクライアントに対して、特殊な、誤っている可能性のあるレスポンスを返す実験を事前の告知なしで実施することがあります。

以下のような、連合SNSで必要になる基本的な通信は妨げないように実験をしていますが、ここに記載されていない、Mastodonが提供する REST API へのユーザー認証なしでのアクセスやスクレイピングなどについては一切考慮しておらず、正しくないレスポンスを返す可能性があります。不都合があるようでしたらクローラー等のブロックリストへの追加をご検討ください。

  • ActivityPub に準拠した実装との ActivityPub の範囲内での送受信
  • その他、一般に連合間で通信する際に利用される WebFinger 等の通信
  • OAuthで当サーバーのユーザーがログインするのに必要な最低限の通信と、当サーバーのユーザーのOAuthアクセストークンが付与された状態で行われた通信

Description:
これはなに

御茶会 / 竹輪部 の部員向けのMastodonインスタンスです。

登録したいのですが

御茶会の Slackの#generalのchannel topicと Discordの#generalのpinに招待リンクを貼ってあるのでそれを見てください。

やっちゃだめなこと

  • サーバーに多大な負荷をかけること
  • その他日本国の法律的にまずいこと
  • 自動フォロー
    • この「自動」はフォローやリプライを送ったことをきっかけとしてフォローする物には当てはまりません(LTLやFTL等を見て片っ端からフォローするようなアカウントが対象です)
    • このサーバーのユーザーを自動フォローする外部サーバーも対象です。このサーバーに対して自動フォローを行ったアカウントは永久凍結されます。

Code of Conduct

(Code of conduct taken from Masotodon.social's excellent example.)

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Ragged Feathers:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, possibly including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, possibly including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and will more than likely result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism or similar bigotry

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Description:
Mootech is supposed to be a home for soft friends. Please let us know if you want to join and read the rules.

The most important rule here though. If you find something bad, you have a few options:

  • block/mute the offending user
  • block/mute the offending user's instance
  • report the offending user
Never resort to harassment yourself. We have tools here, so use them!
The mooderators and admins are here to protect our community. We will listen to you and take actions accordingly, even if that means to cut out other people. Protection of this community has the highest priority.

Content warnings

Generally speaking, cater to your audience. It is your experience, so CW what you see fit. If you find others not Content Warning things you'd like to have them, please use tools (as unfollowing, blocking, etc) at your leisure and please don't resort to harassment.

Some general guidelines though:

  • Nudity, sexual explicit content and similar should always be content warned
  • Eye contact of real and fictional characters, as well as animal eye contact should also receive content warnings
  • Food should receive a content warning
  • All politics related topics should be content warned
  • Mental health (MH) and physical health (PH) topics should be content warned
  • Posts that ask for financial help should also receive content warnings
More might be added in the future. Also these are guidelines. You can use CW for more or less. In the end, it's your experience. These guidelines are based on common good practice though. So following them is highly recommend to keep yourself out of trouble.

Creative people on this instance

These are not all people, doing creative things, here!

  • @MaxFirestorm Makes videos about games (Patreon links)
  • @maxine Creates games and draws randomly sometimes (Patreon links)
  • @ulvra Cute artsy pupper! (Patreon links | FurAffinity links | Weasul links | )

Art copyrights

Banner art, other art and many emojis are made by @ulvra and you should give her pets for making all this wonderful art.
The Shon emoji are made by Qooz.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

The emoji is made by @minty_da@cybre.space

IMPORTANT NOTICE

スパム対策のため、当面の間アカウント登録を承認制にしています。

また、一時的にTor経由のアクセスをブロックしています。

To combat spam, we have temporarily implemented an approval system for account registrations.

Additionally, we are temporarily blocking access via Tor.

このサーバーについて

Mastodon Ikebukuro Division（マストドン イケブクロ・ディビジョン）は、「池袋」という単語が刺さる人向けのMastodonサーバーです。

ガイドライン

利用規約に抵触しない限り、誰でも利用でき、どんなこともトゥートできます。

このサーバーはRC版を含め、可能な限り早期に新バージョンへの追従を行います。そのため、予告なくメンテナンスを行う場合があります。

新規登録について

新規登録を行うと、noreply@mstdn.ikebuku.roから登録確認メールが届きます。メールサービスによっては迷惑メールに振り分けられる場合がありますので、迷惑メールフォルダを確認してください。

接続しているリレーサーバー

このサーバーは以下のリレーに接続しています

  • YUKIMOCHI Toot Relay Service
  • ハッシュタグリレー
Short: Mastodon Ikebukuro Division（マストドン イケブクロ・ディビジョン）は、「池袋」という単語が刺さる人向けのMastodonサーバーです。

  • Racism or advocation of racism

  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

  • Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
  • These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Description:
Welcome to Puppo Space!

About this Instance


Puppo Space is a general, furry-orientated instance that promotes openness and a supportive environment for people from different walks of life. Users are encouraged to engage in friendly discussions across a broad range of topics without fear of discrimination or targeted harassment of an individual or group. Users are responsible for helping maintain a harassment-free environment by consistently and accurately reporting content that fails to meet these requirements.

Content Management



The Mastodon software implements a feature called Content Warnings (or CWs for short) that can be used to set a message in front of content and hide the rest behind the "Show More" button. If a user does not wish to view the content described in the message simply ignore the "Show More" button.
Content that is not properly hidden behind a suitable CW are subject to removal by the moderation team. Content that originates from outside the Puppo Space instance will be silenced if content does not follow these guidelines. Users can still follow users and receive toots from silenced instances.

Suspended Instances



Instances that go against the mission of this instance, fail to properly moderate content, promote hateful ideology, and generally cause a nuisance on the federation as reported by other Masto-Admins are subject to having their instance suspended from federating with Puppo Space.

Registration Requirements


  • Minimum signup age 18
  • A valid email address

Restricted Content


  • NFSW/Lewd/Adult Content not hidden behind a CW
  • Political commentary or mentions of drugs or drug use without a CW
  • Excessively large messages not contained behind a CW
  • Harassment (of any kind)
  • Content deemed illegal within the United States or Canada
  • Content owned by someone else and used without permission
  • Posts promoting excessive or extremist levels of violence
  • Distribution of malware or other potentially unwanted software through the service
  • Using hurtful or targeted language to attack a certain group or user
  • Excessive trolling
  • Misappropriating memes as use as hate symbols, this includes posting memes that are largely considered to be hate symbols


Intentional Abuse



Use of data transmitted to or from Puppo Space servers in a manor that is not consistent with its expected use is deemed abuse and will result in the offending party(s) access to the services being permanently revoked. Actions considered abuse are not limited to...


  • Stalking a particular user
  • Using posts in order to provide targeted advertising
  • Scraping user profiles (Mastodon bots are okay)
  • Intentionally submitting excessive amounts of posts within a small window of time
  • False reports, intentionally rallying users to mass report a user will also be considered abuse
  • Intentional attempts to mislead or impersonate a specific user or group

Clear notification of boundaries



Users who ignore clear attempts by one or more parties to end further communication on a topic (eg: messages asking to be left alone or to go away) will receive disciplinary actions taken against their account.

Multiple Accounts



Users are permitted to have multiple accounts for use in separating their content (eg: separate SFW and NSFW accounts) or for use in bots. Using multiple accounts as a way to evade a block is not permitted under any circumstances.

Team Invitation



Users who are actively involved in the community and are consistently being positive role models may be invited to join the moderation team. Users who are invited to the moderation team are expected to maintain a professional separation from moderation duties and interactions with other users.
Under no circumstances should a moderator use their powers in a manner deemed inappropriate by the administration team. Moderators who fail to meet these requirements will be promptly removed from the team.

Moderators and Administrators of Puppo Space volunteer their time and effort to keep this website going. Please do not send in applications or requests to join the team if you absolutely require a paycheck for your time and dedication.

Reporting Copyright Infringement



Puppo Space allows users to share messages between local and remote instances and does not employ algorithms in order to detect content posted on the network.

If you are a copyright owner whose intellectual rights have been violated due to a post on Puppo Space, please send details (Offending user, message URL, timestamp) and any supporting documentation verifying ownership of said content to dmca at puppo dot space.

Content found to be in violation of the DMCA are subject to immediate removal and are immediately purged from our edge cache upon deletion. Users who regularly post copyrighted material without permission will be permanently suspended.

Submitting an appeal



If you are an instance owner and have identified your instance in our suspend/silence filter and wish to know more, please contact the instance operators at staff at puppo dot space

If you are a user and believe you have been wrongfully suspended or banned from the instance you are allowed up to a maximum of 5 appeals, after which all further requests for unblock will be ignored.

Intentionally using a proxy or VPN service in order to evade a ban will result in that service's addresses being blocked. If you are caught evading a temporary ban both accounts will be upgraded to a permaban.
Short: A general topic server that is open to all. Instance is furry-adjacent but not it's primary topic focus.

Description:
Instanz von myifn.de. Hier soll es jedem ermöglicht werden, dem Fediverse zu joinen. Der Server wird in Deutschland gehostet und unterliegt somit dem Deutschen Datenschutz und Recht.

Fediverse-freundliche Moderation-Vereinbarung

Diese Instanz verpflichtet sich zu Folgendem

1. Die Verwaltung und Moderation wird so neutral wie möglich gehandhabt

Berichte und weit verbreitete Informationen über bestimmte Vorfälle (oft als Bad Actors bezeichnet) werden überprüft und es werden gegebenenfalls Maßnahmen ergriffen.

2. Die ergriffenen Maßnahmen beschränken sich auf das Nötigste, um den Betrieb des Netzes aufrechtzuerhalten und die Fähigkeit der Nutzer der Instanzen, mit anderen Personen in Verbindung zu treten, nicht zu beeinträchtigen

  • Wenn eine andere Instanz Medieninhalte verbreitet, die für die Region, in der die aktuelle Instanz arbeitet, rechtlich fragwürdig sind aus der die aktuelle Instanz arbeitet, können diese Dateien von der Speicherung ausgeschlossen werden.
  • Wenn eine andere Instanz hasserfüllte Nachrichten verbreitet, die sich auf lokale Benutzer auswirken, kann in Erwägung gezogen werden, diese Instanz in den Timelines zu muten Wenn Nutzer der Zielinstanz folgen und/oder folgen wollen können sie dies weiterhin tun.
  • Wenn eine andere Instanz Inhalte veröffentlicht, die in der Region, in der die lokale Instanz arbeitet, illegal sind, oder aktiv Inhalte veröffentlicht die lokale Benutzer angreifen, kann eine vollständige Instanzsperre das letzte Mittel sein.

3. Kommunikation vor Aktionen

Wenn eine der oben genannten Verhaltensweisen bei einer bestimmten Instanz auftritt, wird die Moderation der lokalen Instanz versuchen die Moderation/Administration dieser Instanz zu informieren und die Probleme von dort aus zu lösen. Nur wenn die Kommunikation nicht erfolgreich war oder keine Ergebnisse zur Lösung der Probleme erzielt wurden, werden Maßnahmen gegenüber dieser Instanz ergriffen.

4. Wir empfehlen keine Blocks

Blocklisten und Blockempfehlungen als Informationsquelle werden als selbstverständlich angesehen, sind aber nicht genau verifiziert. Anstatt diese Optionen zu nutzen, um Fälle von fragwürdigen Absichten öffentlich bekannt zu machen, werden wir die Nutzer vor Ort darüber informieren und sie an mögliche persönliche Optionen zum Ausblenden von Inhalten erinnern, die ihre Erfahrung mit dem Netzwerk beeinträchtigen könnten.

5. Keine Schuld durch Assoziation/Verband

Wenn wir eine Maßnahme gegen Instanz X ergriffen haben, wird eine Instanz Y, die mit ihr föderiert ist, nicht mit demselben Urteil belegt werden. Eine natürliche Verbindung, wie sie durch das Design des Netzwerks gegeben ist, impliziert keine gemeinsamen Interessen und rechtfertigt daher nicht die gleichen Moderationsmethoden.

Ungeachtet aller oben genannten Punkte kann die Instanzmoderation/-verwaltung in besonderen Fällen immer noch beschließen, eine Instanz zu sperren.

<h1 id="fediverse-friendly-moderation-covenant">Fediverse Friendly Moderation Covenant</h1>
<h3 id="this-instance-commits-to-the-following">This instance commits to the following</h3>
<h4 id="administration-and-moderation-will-be-handled-as-neutral-as-possible">1. Administration and Moderation will be handled as neutral as possible</h4>
<p>Reports and widespread information on specific instances (often known as <strong>bad actors</strong>) will be verified

and actions might be taken as necessary.

2. Actions taken will respond to the bare minimum to keep the network operating and not influence the ability of the instances users to connect to other people

  • If another instance spreads media content of questionable legality for the region the current instance is operating from, these files might be rejected from being saved.
  • If another instance is sharing hateful messages that impact local users, there might be consideration of silencing that specific instance from being visible in timelines. If users follow and/or wish to follow users on the target instance, they are still free to do so.
  • If another instance is posting content illegal in the local instance operation region or actively posts content attacking local users, a full instance block might be the last resort.

3. Communication before Actions

If any of the above behaviours start to surface from a given instance, the moderation of the local instance will attempt to inform the moderation/administration of that instance and resolve the problems coming from there. Only if no communication succeeded or no results that resolved issues came forth, actions will be taken towards that instance.

4. We won't recommend blocks

Blocklists and block recommendations as an information source are taken for granted but lack accurate verification. Instead of using these options to publicly announce instances of questionable intent, we will inform local users of such, with the reminder of possible personal options for hiding content that might impact their experience of the network.

5. No Guilt-by-Association/Federation

If we have applied any action against Instance X, an Instance Y that federates with them will not get the same judgement applied to them. A natural connection, as by the networks design, does not imply shared interests and thus doesn't warrant the same moderation methods.

Regardless of all given points above, in special cases the instance moderation/administration might still opt to block an instance, while this is tried to be avoided at most.

This Covenant is based on The Fediverse-Friendly Moderation Covenant and is licensed under CC0

Description:
欢迎来到秘密结社「lejaua6」！

无机质的忠实守门人欢迎您，开门密钥是「016」。

秘密結社？

秘密結社 lejaua6 是一个旨在倒立的泛 ACG 中文 Mastodon 实例。这个实例来源于同名的偶像大师爱好者社群，除此之外再无特别。

你可以使用任何语言发表任何内容，只需遵守下文的结社公约。公约由结社元老院随性决定，随时更新。

当前，本实例由结社委托位于日本东京的合同会社 estroitia管理维护，其服务器位于欧洲联盟（法国、葡萄牙）。欢迎你随时为结社添砖加瓦。

什么是 Mastodon ？

Mastodon 是一个开源、去中心化的社交网络服务，它使用 ActivityPub 协议，标准化、开放、互通。它信奉「任何人都拥有运行，检查，审核，复制，修改，分发和重用 Mastodon 源代码的完全自由，只要他们保证任何衍生作品都具有同等的自由。」

任何人均可开设自己的 Mastodon 实例，为这个杰出的服务添砖加瓦，正如结社的诞生。

如果你想进行更多了解，强烈建议阅读官方中文文档。

结社公约

  1. 本实例整体受到欧洲联盟、法国、葡萄牙与日本法律的多重管辖下。各用户的发言可能受到各用户国籍国或住所地国法的管辖。
  2. 加入结社视同各用户自动同意本实例服务提供商 Masto.host 的协议与声明。
  3. 元老院禁止真人儿童色情、网络诈骗及扰乱社区秩序的机器人内容。
  4. 未经元老院个别批准，禁止开设 Bot 。
  5. 请牢记以日本标准使用 NSFW 标签，善用折叠功能。
  6. 元老院可在没有事先预告的情况下暂停、终止本实例，且不对任何可能导致的内容灭失或毁损负任何责任。
  7. 元老院可在内部投票后，宣布放逐包括但不限于有以下行为的用户：
    1. 有严重违反法律法规的行为；
    2. 试图谋反，或颠覆结社；
    3. 窃取结社机密，或窃取吉祥物肾；
    4. 放弃与结社成员和睦相处的努力，或放气心爱的小黄鸭；
    5. 其他任何元老院多数认为不适当的行为。
  8. 元老院任何成员可不经内部投票，直接放逐包括但不限于有以下行为的用户：
    1. 在结社内的行为和言论涉及严重的人权侵害，或涉嫌严重犯罪；
    2. 发送真人儿童色情或网络诈骗内容；
    3. 明显的未经许可的机器人、垃圾帐号或意义不明的发言；
    4. 试图冒充他人、他肾、她竹等；
    5. 明示或默示无法遵守或拒绝遵守结社公约。
  9. 元老院可随时经多数决定修改结社公约，仅在本页或指定的场所做通知。

我可以加入吗？

现在，你可以通过在首页填写注册理由，将你的结社加入申请提交元老院等候批准，以加入本实例。

任何人可以随意提交加入申请，但元老院可能因为任何理由拒绝任何人的申请。开门密钥只对守门人管用，大脑升级的元老院成员是不会理会的。
Short: 秘密結社 lejaua6 是一个旨在倒立的泛 ACG 简体中文 Mastodon 实例。现在，本实例采取熟人开放制。你可以申请元老院批准，以加入本实例。当然，你需要遵守结社元老院制定的公约，并提供足够详细的申请理由。即便如此，你的申请也可能被以任意理由拒绝。

Description:
<h2>What's Mastodon?</h2>
    <p>
        Traditional social media relies on selling your data to advertisers. Mastodon is different. 
        It is diverse ecosystem consisting of multiple servers hosting user profiles which are connected to each other.
        Like email, you can choose your provider and even switch it from the settings later on if you wish. 
        If you aren't happy with any provider, you can even install your own server and set your own rules. 
        Mastodon lets you control your data!
    </p>
<h2>How's jako.social different from other Mastodon instances?</h2>
<p>
    Traditional social media makes money by forcing users to give up their data if they want 
    to access that platform and they often rely on that. Mastodon tries to be different, but 
    without ad revenue, how can an instance survive? Most instances pay their server bills 
    using donations which they depend on. This makes it almost impossible to be sure which instance
    will receive enough donations to keep it alive for the next year.
</p>
<p>
    Jako.social is funded using web monetization protocol, which aims to be more sustainable than just
    donations, so the hosting bill is paid by our users and backed up by @jimbo@jako.social. Therefore there is
    no pressure for data collection or advertising, since there are no shareholders or no reason to make this profitable,
    the main goal is just to get enough income to keep the servers running. No more or no less. If there ever happened 
    to be more income than needed, it  will be donated towards the development of Mastodon or Pixelfed.
</p>
<p>
    Using web monetization on Jako.social is optional.
</p>
<h3>What's web monetization?</h3>
<p>
    Web monetization is a way to fund websites without collecting
    excessive amounts of user data. In practice it requires just a browser extension, which sends tiny
    fractions per second of chosen currency to any website which is currently active, on some websites, you may get ad free experience
    other premium features. At the time of writing, the expenses are limited to 5$/month/user and there are no other expenses for the user
    on Coil.com which is the creator of this protocol.
</p>
<p>
    Web monetization is different from direct donation, since with web monetization the website you spend the 
    most time on will get the highest split of the monthly five dollars, and you as the user will receive the 
    benefits on every web monetization enabled website. On Jako.social, we consider it as a donation, but 
    instead of fixed donation amount, we have to "earn" the donation by providing reliable service, web monetization
    only works when the website is working.
</p>
<p>
    But as mentioned earlier, using this is optional. However to our knowledge this is the only
    Mastodon instance supporting web monetization at the moment if you happen to already be web monetization user.
</p>
<a href="https://coil.com/" target="_blank"><button>Read more about web monetization from Coil.com</button></a>

<p>
    The web monetization is implemented using NGINX 
    injection to the html so no source code is modified and no scripts are added.
</p>

<h3>Who is this server for?</h3>
<p>
    This server is't focused into any specific topic
</p>

<h2>Code of Conduct</h2>

More details can available by clicking the list items.

<ul>
    <li>
        <details>
            <summary>The content posted on this server must comply with Finnish law!</summary>
            <ul>
                <li>Our moderators are humans and we rather be safe than sorry when it comes to edge cases related to law</li>
                <li>Selling or marketing of drugs or teaching how to make them may result in moderation actions like limitations even if the content is legal in Finland for safety reasons</li>
                <li>Selling or marketing of weapons or teaching how to make them is prohibited</li>
            </ul>
        </details>
    </li>
    <li>
        <details>
            <summary>No spamming or mass advertising</summary>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    Please contact admins before setting up a bot
                </li>
    <li>
        Profiles belonging to different entities (like corporations, organizations) with no content and no profile picture and profiles with primarily advertisements will be silenced or shut down per case basis. Jako.social isn't a place to primarily boost your Search Engine Optimization (SEO).
    </li>
            </ul>
        </details>
    </li>
    <li>
        <details>
            <summary>No harrassing of other users</summary>
            <ul>
                <li>Posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information without permission is prohibited</li>
            </ul>
        </details> 
    </li>
    <li>
        No pornography, no sexual depictions of children
    </li>
    <li>
        <details><summary> No promotion of conspiracy theories or organized spreading 
        of misinformation</summary>
        This includes theories that undermine public health
        </details>
    </li>
    <li>
        No Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities or minorities in general, or advocation thereof
    </li>
    <li>
        No xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    </li>
    <li>
        No Holocaust denialism, no Nazi symbolism, no promotion of 
        National Socialism
    </li>
    <li>
        No gore or graphic violence
    </li>
    <li>
        Please use the content warning option when necessary. 
        Content warning is not a way to circumvent the rules for behavior
    </li>
</ul>
<p>
    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service 
    reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at 
    any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
</p>
<p>
    Mastodon allows you to view and interact with content from
    other servers, which we cannot moderate.
</p>
<h3>Who is behind this server</h3>
<p>
    <a href="https://jako.social/@jimbo" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">@jimbo</a>
</p>
Short: Mastodon instance funded using web monetization protocol, which is a privacy respecting way of funding sustainable internet services. From Finland, for English and/or Finnish speaking users.

Description:
Bonjour !

Mas.atmx.ca repose sur Mastodon et est entièrement hébergé au Québec. Nous visons ultimement à faire de cette plateforme un espace de discussion cordial, sans publicité, ouvert à tous et où on peut discuter de tout dans le respect. Atmx a aussi une instance Peertube, tv.atmx.ca, pour les créateurs vidéo.

Inscriptions

Les inscriptions sont présentement ouvertes.

Règles du serveur

Nous vous demandons de respecter les règles suivantes:
  • Aucune action haineuse (racisme, sexisme, homophobie, etc.)
  • Pas de doxxing
  • Si vous ne le feriez pas en tant qu'invité chez quelqu'un, ne le faites pas ici.

Nous aider!

Notre but ici est simplement de vous donner un espace de discussion mais si vous voulez nous aider, vous pouvez simplement partager notre existence ou nous envoyer vos dons aux coordonnées ci-dessous.

Patreon: patreon.com/user?u=82486974

Bienvenue sur notre instance!

Description:
Instance rules

Summary of rules

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.

The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.

We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant and to prevent our users from being exposed to content that does not comply with our instance rules.

Detailed rules

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.grimneko.de; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

<ol><li>The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    <ol type="a"><li>Excessive advertising</li>
    <li>Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions</li>
    <li>Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions</li>
    </ol></li>
<p>
<li>The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    <ol type="a"><li>Racism or advocation of racism</li>
    <li>Sexism or advocation of sexism</li>
    <li>Casteism or advocation of casteism</li>
    <li>Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof</li>
    <li>Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism</li>
    <li>Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health</li></ol></li>
    <p>
<li>The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    <ol type="a"><li>Sexual depictions of children</li>
    <li>Content illegal in Germany, including holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism</li>
    <li>Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism</li></ol></li>
<p>
    <li>Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    <ol type="a"><li>Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.</li>
    <li>Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.</li>
    <li>Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.</li></ol>
    </li></ol>

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Short: A small instance. Feel welcome to join me on my quest to explore the fediverse.

Description:
什么是Mastodon(长毛象)


长毛象的更多使用说明可以参见:官方中文说明

站点简介

这里是一个开放、友善的长毛象实例,欢迎不同爱好、职业的象友进行交流,这里是一个泛话题实例,你可以畅所欲言,欢迎来这里安家。
请在遵守所在国家或者地区法律法规的前提下自由的使用。本站运行着长毛象服务,是"联邦宇宙"中的一员。请在提醒某些地区的朋友们注意隐私的前提下尽情邀请他们来玩吧!

使用条例

“开放”代表您可以:

  1. 发布政治、成人等内容不受言论审查。(标注好 content warning 和 NSFW 预警的基础上)
  2. 发表不违反服务器所在地法律的内容,不会被站长移交信息给政府部门。

不代表您可以:

  1. 骚扰、辱骂、威胁、人身攻击其他用户。
  2. 发布宣扬暴力、歧视、仇恨、恋童、诈骗等内容。(请遵守服务器所在地的法律法规)
  3. 将“不认同”的其他用户言论举报至政府部门。
  4. 以任何形式上传、分享儿童色情(包括但不限于图片、文字、网址等)

以上行为会导致在本站封号并视危害程度可能公示。

实例细则

这里是个新的实例,初来乍到,站规不断完善中。如有意见建议请在站内或联邦内呼叫： @maisui@el5.net 。

  1. 意见不同、内容不喜欢请善用“静音”、“屏蔽”,站内“举报”仅适用于上面“不代表您可以”中所举严重违反站规的内容。
  2. 请尊重他人的知识产权,转载请向作者申请授权;
  3. 本站无需自我审核使用不是为了方便的缩写,但请勿持续无意义谩骂,至于什么是无意义,use your best judgement, 随着内容的增长会更新细则;
  4. 成人内容(NSFW)和可能引起他人不适的内容(血腥暴力、剧透、较为偏激的言论等)请善用折叠 CW 功能和说明
  5. 本站默认对搜索引擎开放。想搜索本站内容 请使用Google [site:el5.net+空格+关键词] 。如您不希望自己嘟文被搜索引擎收录,请在 首选项->其他-> 禁止搜索引擎建立索引 前面打勾。
  6. 请勿注册可能会被误会与本站官方有联系的用户名与昵称,如“管理员”、”admin“等,违者将被警告,三天之内未修改为允许用户名将被封号。
  7. 本站管理员保证不会主动泄露大家的数据,但请务必注意隐私保护以防不可抗力造成的不必要麻烦。
  8. 为了防止灾难导致本站数据丢失的情况出现,本站将每日数据库备份数据并上传至AWS,所有存档将保留90日。因此,若您删除了自己的账号,您的相关数据仍将保留90日,请知悉。
  9. 无需太替站长的钱包担心,请尽情地发布原创图片吧。没钱了站长会想办法的。

服务承诺

我们的服务器位于 德国纽伦堡
原则上你在这里享受言论自由。但一般情况下你只需遵守自己所在国家(地区)的法律[注 1]，和我们服务器所在地的法律[注 2]。 本实例为非商业项目,没有SLA保证,注意定期备份关注列表及嘟文。但站长会尽我最大的努力将网站的正常运行时间率保持在99.9%以上。
同时,本实例采用高安全配置,请确保使用HTTPS访问我们,以最大限度保证您的数据在传输中的安全。

管理招募

如果你想对本实例的管理做出贡献（有时间，有能力，有爱好）请邮箱联系 maisuier[at]pm[dot]me 进行申请。
要求：

  • 填写你本实例用户名和邮箱
  • 在本实例有一定时间的活跃度和内容输出。
  • 能够做出对站内象友的隐私保护承诺

已接入公共中继站公示

https://relay.dragon-fly.club/
https://relay.nya.one/
https://relay.mastodon.fun/
https://relay.mstdn.one/
https://mastodon-relay.moew.science/
https://relay.isle.moe/
https://relay.acg.mn/

Updated on 2023-10-17;

注释

  1. ^
    属人管辖权：凡具有某国国籍或护照的公民，某国对其即有司法管辖权。
    属地管辖权：按照国际通用的归属地管辖原则，用户当前身处哪一国，就要接受哪一国的法律管理。
    更多详情可以参加Wikipedia[中文]:司法管辖权相关的页面
  2. ^ 任何情况下请不要触碰儿童色情相关内容，以免服务器被端
Short: 象吾是一个开放、包容、多元的联邦宇宙实例。无论您喜欢什么话题，都可以在这里找到志同道合的朋友。在这里，您可以发掘新的兴趣，与他人交流心得，共同成长。我们期待您的加入，一起探索一个温暖、多彩的社交空间。
A home in the fediverse for fans of Nick Lutsko, grandmas, and friendly folks! Invite only and 18+ for ease of mind.

Description:
Server

Meinungsschubla.de is proudly run on the following machine:
CPUCore i3-8300T 4x 2.3GHz
Ram16GB
Storage (DB)SSD
Storage (Media)HDD
Connection SpeedFibre 500MBit/s Down - 100MBit/s Up
ProtocolsIPv4 + IPv6
LocationMy Home

Guidelines

On meinungsschubla.de our primary directive is:
→ "Be nice to each other!"

Please remember there are real people on the other side of the screen, and those people may have different feelings and opinions and experiences than you do. Some of them may be tired or having a bad day. Or you might.

You don't have to agree with someone to be civil to them. If you can't be civil to someone, leave them alone.

If you don't wish to interact with someone, or see any of their posts, there are tools at your disposal including mute and block functions.

If someone's posts make you angry or upset, take some time to calm down before you reply. You might also try simply excusing yourself from a conversation and ask them to untag you if you no longer wish to discuss a topic.

When someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. If you feel like you can't control your urge to respond to that person, use the block or mute feature so you won't see their posts and be tempted.

Keep in mind that while you cannot control other people's behavior, you are still responsible for your own conduct, even if you feel someone was rude to you or someone else.

We will not allow abusive or disruptive conduct by or toward users on meinungsschubla.de. This includes continuing to engage in conversation with someone who has specifically requested you leave them alone, inciting other users to engage with that person on your behalf, aggregating and posting another person's personal information without their consent, and inciting others to engage with that person on other platforms. Blocking someone and then sitting on the other side of a block and continuing to talk about that person is also a provoking behavior.

Before you post, think about whether this is the kind of thing you would like to see (or would like your mom or kids to see) in the public timeline. There are post visibility settings that give you some control over which timelines your post appears in, and also CW and NSFW buttons to hide specific text and images in your post. Be a good social media neighbor and use these functions when appropriate.

Content not allowed on meinungsschubla.de

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Racism, Sexism, Homophobia and Transphobia

Content which will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Untagged pornography- and sexually explicit content
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    • We will also remove any content we judge to be hateful toward specific individuals or groups, or intended to cause or incite harm from the public timeline.

        This guideline is intentionally vague because we do not intend to play "rules lawyer" on the subject
    of what it is and isn't okay to say about people. A good rule of thumb is, if you're about to say
    something you think might fall foul of this rule, you probably shouldn't say it. ☺</p>

Timeline Flooding

In order to keep the best user experience, we ask you not to send like twenty toots in two minutes (exemplification) as people want to be able to see more than just one user in their timelines.
Of course we understand and may do an exception for critical reasons of yours like a kind of serious emergency situation for example.

Reporting / Moderation Notes

If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review,
it is very important for us, as it makes our work easier and this instance a more enjoyable place.
Please note however that repeately falsely reporting users is not welcomed and are treated as feature-abuse.

In case you broke our rules by mistake, we may try to reach out to you so please make sure not to block the team of meinungsschubla.de.

These guidelines are not a legal document, they're here to provide you with an insight into our moderation policies. Final interpretation is up to the administration of meinungsschubla.de and the administration reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Staff

  • @Nico (Site Owner)

Federation status

meinungsschubla.de does not believe in censorship. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort where content from another server may cause problems under German law, or in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation or silence another instance for one/some of these reasons, it will be noted here (now further below). Did we make a wrong decision in your opinion? Ping us!


(Note: you can still communicate with users on silenced instances; their posts will not appear in our public timelines. You will not be able to see posts made by users on suspended instances.)

Reporting an issue

For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact" For content or abuse issues:

  • if you're a user on meinungsschubla.de you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
  • If you're not a user on meinungsschubla.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact"


For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

Privacy

Please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

meinungsschubla.de does not use advertising or external analytics software and does not sell your information.


Impressum

Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG

Description:
Über diese Mastodon-Instanz

Youthweb.social wird vom gemeinnützigen Youthweb e.V. betrieben.

Unsere Mastodon-Instanz dient schwerpunktmäßig, aber nicht ausschließlich dazu, deutschsprachigen Nutzerinnen und Nutzern eine freie, nachhaltige digitale Plattform zum Austausch über christliche, kirchliche und religiöse Themen zu bieten. Der Betrieb der Instanz fördert zudem den zivilgesellschaftlichen Austausch und der Vernetzung von Gemeinden. Andere Themen und alle Meinungen sind willkommen und werden unterstützt, soweit sie einen offenen, sachlichen und produktiven Dialog stärken und im Einklang mit dem Recht der Bundesrepublik Deutschland, unseren Nutzungsbedingungen und unserem Verhaltenskodex geäußert werden.

Moderation

Wir überwachen Nutzerkonten, Beiträge und Nutzerinteraktionen nicht. Gemäß §§ 8-10 Telemediengesetz sind wir nicht für fremde Informationen verantwortlich, solange wir keine Kenntnis davon haben. Unser Moderations-Team wird aber unverzüglich tätig, sobald wir Kenntnis von problematischen Informationen erlangen.

Gesperrte Instanzen

Youthweb.social ist Teil eines föderierten Netzes. In diesem Fediverse ist der Austausch von Beiträgen zwischen den verschiedenen Instanzen möglich. Auf anderen Server können gelten andere Regeln und werden andere Themen besprochen. So kann es vorkommen, dass auf Youthweb.social Inhalte zu sehen sind, die nicht unseren Regeln entsprechen.

Daher behalten wir uns ausdürcklich vor, den Datenaustausch mit anderen Instanzen und sonstigen Servern im Fediverse einzuschränken, wenn diese Instanzen und Server Verhaltensweisen fördern, die gegen unsere Nutzungsbedingungen, gegen Gesetze der Bundesrepublik Deutschland oder gegen unseren Verhaltenskodex verstoßen.

Hier unten kannst du sehen, welche Server und deren Inhalte auf youthweb.social nicht zu sehen sind.
Short: Youthweb.social ist eine freie soziale Plattform zur Vernetzung von jungen Christen im deutschsprachigem Raum. Youthweb.social beinhaltet überwiegend christliche oder kirchliche Themen.

Description:
This is unstable.systems, a general-purpose invite-only Mastodon instance. We'll always be pretty small, and we hope to be a comfortable instance to be on. This instance is maintained by demize.

We have a status page hosted on statuspage.io, which is accessible through https://status.unstable.systems (which redirects to https://unstable-systems.statuspage.io). Planned maintenance will be announced there, and any updates on unexpected downtime will be communicated through there.

If you're interested in the technical details: this instance is running the Treehouse fork of Mastodon. It's running on a dedicated server from OVH, hosted in Quebec, Canada, with a Xeon-E 2386G, 32GB of RAM, and 512GB of RAID1 SSD disk space. This server is dedicated to this instance. Media files (including cached media files) are stored in OVH High Performance Object Storage, also in Quebec, and served through a caching proxy on the same server (using nginx).

There are currently no methods to support the instance financially, nor are there plans to request financial support from any users. This is offered as a courtesy, primarily to demize's friends who want accounts.

This server includes the Blobfox, Neofox, and BunHD emoji sets from volpeon.ink, which are shared under Apache 2.0 (Blobfox and BunHD) and Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Neofox). It also includes the BlobCats and GooglyBlobCats sets from DuckOfDisorder, licensed under Apache 2.0.
Short: This is unstable.systems, a general-purpose invite-only Mastodon instance. We'll always be pretty small, and we hope to be a comfortable instance to be on.

Welcome to Focal Social.

Description:
Social Dogs Global

Hauptrichtlinie ¶

Unsere Hauptrichtlinie: → "Seid nett zueinander!"

Rules ¶

"Be excellent to each other" is easier said than done, and means different things to different people.

The following rules are a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, silencing or suspension of accounts, at the descretion of the instance administrators, as described in our Terms.

Please report behaviour that bothers you. We will keep your report confidential.

  • We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups. These groups may be characterised by any of the following (though this list is naturally incomplete):
    • ethnicity
    • gender identity or expression
    • sexual identity or expression
    • physical characteristics or age
    • disability or illness
    • nationality, residency, citizen status
    • wealth or education
    • religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
  • We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
  • We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
  • We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
  • We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
  • We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
  • Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
  • Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.


Best practices ¶

The list below is a collection of behaviour that we expect to see from our users. If you see a user go against these best practices in a way that bothers you, please file a report and we will talk to them. While these best practices are designed to be guidelines for a good communal instance, repeated malicious unwillingness to follow the best practices will be considered just like breaking a rule.

  • In general, use the tools provided to foster a considerate and accessible atmosphere. This includes the liberal use of content warnings (especially on potentially disturbing or controversial topics), and alt-text captioning of media files.
  • When possible, provide credit for creative works in your posts that are not your own.
  • Uninvited comments about another user's personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may be considered harassment. Inappropriate sexual attention, comments about appearance and implication of physical contact will not be tolerated toward any non-consenting user.
  • If you post sexual content or gore, use content warnings.
  • If you post advertisements, use a content warning. Advertisements should not be excessive or automated.
  • Bots may only interact with a user when they're invited by that user to do so.
  • Automated posts and high-frequency posts should be unlisted (rendering visible to everybody, but not appearing on the local timeline) to keep the local timeline of our instance a place of community dialogue and human interaction. This extends to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts with broken mentions. Crossposter accounts that stop being active participants in our community may be removed at the discretion of the moderators.
  • In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you're talking to. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.

(These best practices were inspired by the Terms of bsd.network. Thank you!)

We (@watchdog and @Jens) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

Attribution ¶

This text is based and adapted from the "About" of chaos.social, availiable on their Github-Repository.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

This text is free to be adapted and remixed under the terms of the CC-BY (Attribution 4.0 International) license.

Description:
Gut Pfad allseits!

Willkommen auf dieser kleinen Instanz für Pfadfinder und alle, die sich damit verbunden fühlen.

Diese Instanz soll ein Ort sein, sich zu vernetzen, Kontakte zu knüpfen und sich auszutauschen. Dabei muss es nicht zwingend um die Pfadfinderei gehen, ein thematischer Zusammenhang, sei er noch so fern, ist aber immer gern gesehen.

Da wir diese Instanz in unserer Freizeit betreiben und moderieren, bitten wir um eure Mithilfe und um Verständnis, falls unsere Antworten etwas dauern.

Informationen für Gruppierungen

Um zu verhindern, dass sich Fakeaccounts als Organisation oder Gruppierung ausgeben, werden Nutzernamen, die einen solchen Anschein erwecken können, nur zugelassen, wenn der Account glaubhaft machen kann, dass es sich auch um die betreffende Organisation oder Gliederung handelt.

Nach erfolgreicher Verifizierung wird der Account freigegeben. Die Echtheit des Accounts ist dann auch mit einem "Verifizierte Organisation"-Badge im Profil erkennbar.

Bitte teilt uns über eure Registrierung eine Kontaktmöglichkeit mit. Wir setzen uns dann bald möglichst mit euch in Verbindung, um euch zu verifizieren.

Nutzer, die erkennbar keine Organisationen, Vereine oder Firmen sind, müssen keine Kontaktmöglichkeit angeben und werden in aller Regel binnen kurzer Zeit zugelassen.

Kontakt

Wir sind über unseren Adminaccount @kornett, sowie per Email (admin@pfadi.social) erreichbar.
Short:
Gut Pfad!

Diese Community soll für all die da sein, die sich in Kluft und Halstuch ums Lagerfeuer sitzend am wohlsten fühlen.

Description:
Guiding Principles

The server rules below are provided in case they aren't obvious and may be changed at any time. They are explicit examples that flow from the three guiding principles for this instance:

  1. Take care of yourself: know your limits, take time for yourself, and make your place in the Fediverse comfortable for you.
  2. Take care of each other: see everyone for who they are and treat them with the same respect you want to be treated.
  3. Understand the universe: use science to see it as it is and know its limits.

Purpose

This instance is for anyone interested in long-term thinking that benefits everyone. You are welcome to join as long as you abide by the rules. Being on this server is a responsibility rather than a right. If this server isn't for you, there are many other servers to choose from. The Fediverse has a place for everyone, even if it's not the same place as someone else.

Moderation Policy

This is not a free speech zone. It is a civil discourse and respectful speech zone. Any uncivil or disrespectful speech will result in moderation.

We want you to enjoy your time on this instance, but moderators are not reading and approving every post before publication. If you see something that violates the rules, please report it so that we can act on it. If you see something you don't like, but it doesn't break the rules, feel free to block or mute the poster.

If a site expresses hate speech, spam, or harassment, regardless of the extent of that expression, we will silence the site. We do not tolerate intolerance. We may limit sites that otherwise violate our rules so they don't appear in any feeds except for those individuals you might follow.

If a site harasses anyone on this site or abuses their federation with this site we will suspend the site, blocking all interaction between that site and this one.

If you are new to the Fediverse, there is an unofficial guide that might be helpful.

Media File Limits

Images are limited to 10 megabytes. Videos are limited to 40 megabytes.

Mastodon Server Covenant

We are committed to following all parts of the Mastodon Server Covenant soon.

  1. We moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. While we might not be able to review every post in real-time, we will act on all posts brought to our attention, either through our review of the public timeline or from your reports.
  2. We use AWS RDS with daily backups. Media are stored in S3.
  3. We do not yet have a backup administrator with emergency access to the server infrastructure. We are running the server in a Kubernetes cluster with limited autoscaling capabilities.
  4. We are committed to giving users at least 3 months of advance warning before shutting down the server.

This Mastodon server is hosted in the USA.

Support and Funding

Funding is managed through BeneHomini.com. Read the post Introducing BeneHomini.Social for details.

You can also donate directly to the server costs using the following link.

Donate
Short: A community for people interested in long-term thinking that benefits everyone.

Description:
Welcome to thegem.city! This Mastodon server supports the interests and communication of residents of the greater Dayton, Ohio region.

We subscribe to the goals defined in the Mastodon Server Covenant.

We regularly update our federation blocklist with the Unified Tier 0 file, which is further explained on the Oliphant site. Please see the "Moderated servers" on this About page.

Do I need to live in Dayton, OH to have an account?

No, but we do ask that you have some sort of connection to the area to use this instance. Anyone in the Dayton and surrounding metropolitan areas are welcome.

Registration is open, but new accounts must provide a brief example of their connection to Dayton. Existing users may invite others which bypasses that requirement.
Short: Supporting the greater Dayton, Ohio community.

Description:
This server will never be bigger than 100 people. That said, as long as the applications are open, we still have room. If you think you'd feel at home here, please apply!

A note from the admin: I'd like Club Unstraight to be a kind place, and you can't be kind without being vulnerable. During the application process you will be asked to introduce the person and the passion. You introduce the person by writing about three events that shaped you into the person you are today, and the passion by writing about things you'd like to discuss. Each answer should be max 500 characters, as these will be your pinned introduction toots.
Short: A small server for unstraight geeks into pop culture in general, and science-fiction and video games in particular.
