Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Welcome to the OVAL community of professionals in Arts and Sciences.

The goal of this server is to provide a platform for independent established professionals with wide range of experience and expertise in their chosen fields. The OVAL is dedicated to promoting high standards of ethical practice in the profession, connoisseurship and advanced education, and raising public awareness of the paramount role that high quality Art and Science plays in our lives.

We are united by our standards of professionalism, and uphold these standards in our professional practice and as guiding principles of free speech on this server.

STOAT.ZONE is a private server for a small group of existing collaborators with prior agreements about what and how to post, our responsibilities to each other, &c. By sharing the costs of running our own server, we are creating a small, collective online resource for ourselves.

We really recommend this model of participation in the Mastodon ecosystem. Our server is hosted at Masto.host, which is fully managed and couldn't be easier. If large servers aren't for you, try starting one!
Short: The hottest lineage.

Description:
Welcome to MOULE WORLD - A worldbuilding project soundtracking a chaotic world and the cartoon animal characters in it with multi-genre electronic music! Hold on for dear life and Enjoy the Ride!

Now on the Fediverse thanks to Mastodon, you can interact with us from the server(s) you're signed up on! If you're completely new to Mastodon and/or the Fediverse, I highly recommend reading fedi.tips to get started!

This server is hosted on mastodon.moule.world, but thanks to a domain trick our usernames all end with "@moule.world". When viewing our posts, it's best to open mastodon.moule.world in a separate tab to get the full threads and find even more MOULE WORLD posts not federated to your instance!

History of MOULE and MOULE WORLD

I've been producing multi-genre electronic music and digital art since 2015, and after overcoming self-doubt, only began sharing them online from January 1, 2020, starting out on Bandcamp and Twitter.

I started by releasing generic abstract artwork and simple tunes to Bandcamp, before branching out to other services like Spotify etc, gradually gaining the confidence to share my more unique music and cartoony art style.

In mid-2021, the animal characters from my artworks began getting their own names, personalities, and backstories, and my music began soundtracking a world I now call "MOULE WORLD".

In 2022, during chaotic changes at Twitter, I joined the Fediverse! I started my first account on mas.to, then I bought the domain name "moule.world", and taught myself web-hosting and how to set-up this server while banned from Twitter for posting about Elon Musk's jet.

In 2023, I migrated from mas.to to here, and a few months later made my final Tweet after Twitter rebranded to "X". Seven months later in 2024, I deleted my Twitter account, and host a publicly-available archive of my Tweets here.

This is my new "main" social platform and I'm so happy I can continue sharing my world here on the Fediverse!

For the latest MOULE updates, visit MOULE.WORLD!

Acknowledgement of Countries

I create MOULE WORLD's music, artwork, and operate this server on Whadjuk Nyoongar Boodjar, the lands of the Whadjuk Nyoongar people, in south-western Australia.

In addition, this Mastodon server is hosted on Lenapehoking, the lands of the Lenape people, where Newark and New York City are in the USA.

I pay my respects to all Indigenous cultures past, present, and emerging, and to the lands on which I operate.

Funding

This server is funded out of my own pocket, costing AUD$51.00 a month to host on a DigitalOcean server, and AUD$40.80 a year to renew the moule.world domain name.

If you'd like to help support my server's costs, you can donate via PayPal, buy my music on Bandcamp, or buy my designs on Redbubble!

Code of Conduct

Everything I do in this Mastodon instance and my conduct and that of the many characters in it, are part of my own, self-funded solo project hosted in the cloud, with no sign-ups and thus no terms of service. Instead, I have my own Code of Conduct I'll hold myself accountable to, in line with the Mastodon Server Covenant, outlined in the below Server Rules.

The Code of Conduct will also be used as a basis for choosing whether or not MOULE WORLD will federate with other servers. There's 2,500+ instances blocked – half of them being the usual suspects blocked before even opening my server up to the Fediverse.

If you believe I or other MOULE WORLD characters have broken the below Server Rules or would like to dispute a block, feel free to privately message me on the Fediverse (@MOULE@MOULE.WORLD), report the post, or email me, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can!

Credits

• Eugen Rochko et al. – for making the Mastodon software.

• Roni Laukkarinen – for creating the Mastodon Bird UI, which this server uses with some changes to its colours and logo.

• Łukasz Wójcik – for providing an example code of conduct which helped me write the below Server Rules which I hold myself and all MOULE WORLD characters accountable to.

• The numerous contributors who built all the Ruby gems, NPM dependencies, and all the programming for Mastodon and ActivityPub.

• And of course, a HUGE thank you to everyone who supports my music, art, or otherwise interacts with MOULE WORLD. Thank you so much for visiting, and Enjoy the Ride!

(Last updated: May 28, 2024. Added funding information and added Rules 11 and 12)
Short: Soundtracking the MOULE WORLD and its animal characters with multi-genre electronic music!

Description:
f slurs dot gay is an intentionally small fediverse instance, for f slurs and other fruits.

If you think this might be a place for you, please read the server rules, and apply for an account!

As a note, this may not be the most stable instance, I (@sleep) am running this on my lonesome in my free time. While I will not fully promise to follow the Mastodon Server Covenant, I do promise to provide all users with as much time and support as I can to allow them to move to a new instance should I ever decide it's time to turn it off.

Additionally, while I cannot ensure immediate moderation (the instance is currently only run by me), I will attempt to respond to any reports promptly (but please do give me a couple days).

I also promise to do my best to keep this a bigotry free place, as free from transphobia, racism, homophobia, sexism, and any other forms of bigotry I cannot think of while I'm typing this up.

While I do not currently have a full-scale document for outlining my ethos for running this instance (I would like to write that with the community, should one ever start existing here), Darius Kazemi's Run your own social aligns very closely with my own views on running and building a community. I also think any code of conduct that's ever written for f slurs dot gay will end up being very similar to the woof.group code of conduct.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to @sleep!

The default UI theme is Tangerine UI, with some minor modifications.
Short: f slurs dot gay is a fediverse instance for everyone's favorite f slurs

Description:
Fediverse Instanz für alle St. Paulianer_innen, Menschen aus St. Pauli und St. Pauli Lovers.

Es gilt die Stadionordnung des Millerntors. Home des Podcast St. Pauli POP - Registrierung istoffen

*** und nu das Kleingedruckte ***

I. Nutzungsumfang des Angebots

Stpauli.social betreibt diese Instanz freibleibend; er behält sich vor, die Verfügbarkeit des Angebots jederzeit teilweise oder ganz einzustellen sowie die Gestattung eines Accounts zu widerrufen.

II. Impressum und Haftungserklärung

Diese Instanz wird herausgegeben von:

Erik Hauth St. Pauli* Nu Jugend und Sport e.V., vertreten durch Stefan Schatz c/o Fanladen St. Pauli Heiligengeistfeld 1A, 20359 Hamburg E-Mail: eh (aet) stpaulinu (pt) de

Haftung für eigene und fremde Inhalte

Gemäß § 7 Abs. 1 TMG ist stpauli.scoial allein für eigene Inhalte seines Accounts nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen verantwortlich. Er ist nach §§ 8 bis 10 TMG nicht verpflichtet, übermittelte oder gespeicherte fremde Informationen zu überwachen oder nach Umständen zu forschen, die auf eine rechtswidrige Tätigkeit hinweisen. Unberührt davon bleiben eventuelle Verpflichtungen zur Entfernung oder Sperrung von Informationen nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen. Bei Bekanntwerden von entsprechenden Rechtsverletzungen behält sich die Betreiberin vor, umgehend entsprechende Schritte gegen diese zu ergreifen. Haftung für Links

Die auf der Mastodon-Instanz von stpauli.social mit ihren Accounts vorhandenen Verlinkungen wurden, soweit sie von stpauli.social erstellt wurden, nach bestem Wissen und unter Beachtung größtmöglicher Sorgfalt erstellt und vermitteln lediglich den Zugang zu "fremden Inhalten". Andere Verlinkungen entziehen sich im Hinblick auf deren Auswahl dem Einflussbereich von stpauli.social.

Grundsätzlich hat stpauli.social auf den Inhalt verlinkter Webseiten keinen Einfluss. Für diese wird daher auch keine Verantwortung übernommen. Für verlinkte Inhalte ist stets der jeweilige Betreiber oder Anbieter der verlinkten Seite verantwortlich.

Sollten Sie der Ansicht sein, dass die verlinkten externen Seiten gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen oder sonst unangemessene Inhalte haben, so teilen Sie uns dies bitte mit.

Urheberrecht

Die auf den Accounts der Instanz von stpauli.social erstellten Inhalte unterliegen dem deutschen Urheberrecht. Die Vervielfältigung, Bearbeitung, Verbreitung und jede Art der Verwertung außerhalb der Grenzen des Urheberrechtes bedürfen in der Regel der schriftlichen Zustimmung der/des jeweiligen Rechteinhaberin/Rechteinhabers. Sollten Sie auf eine Urheberrechtsverletzung aufmerksam werden, wenden Sie sich an den Betreiber des betroffenen Accounts. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen behält sich stpauli.social vor auch als Betreiber der Instanz gegen diese vorzugehen.

Regeln

Es gilt mein Hausrecht und erweitert die Stadionordnung des FC St. Pauli. Diese Instanz ist ein Safe Place. Nur der Hauch von -Ismus wird geblockt.

Description:
About the Name

CONNECTOPUS /kuh-nektəpʊs/

When we (Octo and John V) had the idea for Connectopus, the friendly octopus connecting you with your community, back in 2016, the landscape seemed prime for a new social platform. We followed many creatives, performers, photographers, and others who had posts constantly reported while hateful and anti-science stuff was left up. After much thinking and when development stalled the idea was scrapped. Now seeing the need for more support to the distributed platforms, the time seemed right to bring the domain back as a Mastodon instance and turn development efforts towards contributing to the open source ActivityPub based ecosystem. Like a friendly octopoda, riding on the back of a proboscidean, here's our instance!

Moderation Team

Fearless leader: @Octo (she/her)
Tech nerd: @johnvenr (he/him)

You should follow @technuition (not a personal account - used for administrative purposes) to see real-time posts for information regarding the server. Also keep an eye out for announcements that appear at the top of your “Home” timeline under the little trumpet icon.

About the Server and Funding

Thanks to Octo, the server this instance runs on is administered and funded by Technuition, a woman owned small business providing IT, technology, and software development services.

If you are able, head to https://patreon.com/johnvenr to pledge your financial support to keeping the instance running - sadly servers and storage cost money and we don't have unlimited financial resources.

Trustees

Special thanks to our “Trustee” level Patreon supporters: @CAman

About the Instance

This Mastodon instance welcomes members of the LGBTQIA+ community and allies. Hate speech and bullying won’t be tolerated. Just because you're behind a computer screen doesn’t mean that you don’t need to respect other people.

We intend for this instance and its moderation to run smoothly. We may or may not notify you when a report you've made has led to a punitive action. Not all punitive actions will be visible to users. First time offenders may have their offensive content removed, but repeat offenders may experience harsher measures up to and including the removal of access to this instance.

This group will not tolerate racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, Nazis, or hate speech which will be determined at the sole discretion of the moderators. All defamatory, abusive, bigoted, threatening, offensive, or illegal material (particularly things illegal in the US as that is where our server is hosted) is strictly prohibited. If you feel that you are experiencing bullying or harassment of any kind please report it to the moderators - report the post or email the administrator account.

We want our community to be able to discuss topics that may be of interest to others but triggering to some. Consent is important in all matters. Some may choose not to see your material so please label things accordingly. If you feel the topic you want to discuss may harm someone who comes across it, please mark it with a content warning (CW). The “CW” button or shield bubble icon with the “!” inside of it. This feature will hide an image that has sensitive content behind a warning banner that can be clicked on to access the material. Sensitive and triggering content may include but not limited to the following: NSFW (we will get into more detail about this later), images with direct eye contact, abuse, wars, graphic images, and mental or physical disorders. Be respectful that everyone has their own experiences and may be triggered by something that you are not triggered by so ensure that you have the proper labels on material. The bottom line is if someone in good faith asks you to CW your post, then kindly use the three dots and select "Delete and re-draft" but this time post with the proper CW.

Since this server is hosted in the US and as a result of (misogynistic) social expectations here, let’s be safe and put all toplessness regardless of gender presentation behind a CW. Any erotic content must also include a CW. If you’re looking to trade your favorite explicit adult content, this is not the place for that. There are other venues for that type of posting.

Further, NSFW is content that you wouldn’t want your manager to see or things you wouldn’t be caught sending to a minor. Minors may be able to see publicly posted non-CW content, so be mindful that your public posts might make their way in front of younger eyes. Please clearly mark explicit content with a CW.

Be respectful of others. We want this to be a welcoming place for people to share and discuss topics that mean something to them. Please try to discuss in good faith. Bad faith arguments are never beneficial. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users or moderators will not be tolerated. If one user has asked for another user to stop certain actions this can be considered harassment and will be addressed accordingly.

Posting or sharing someone's personal information, private data or demographic information without their permission is strictly prohibited.

Some of us make a living by advertising our products and services; however, we’d like to avoid having the instance devolve into a stream of advertisements or requests for money. We also understand that sometimes people need help and mutual aid requests are going to be necessary. If you are unsure if your post is going against this rule, please reach out to the administrator.

If you wonder why we mention actual Nazis this gives a pretty good idea: https://www.upworthy.com/bartender-explains-why-he-swiftly-kicks-nazis-out-of-his-punk-bar-even-if-theyre-not-bothering-anyone

tldr; Karl Popper in 1945:"Unlimited tolerance must lead to the disappearance of tolerance. If we extend unlimited tolerance even to those who are intolerant, if we are not prepared to defend a tolerant society against the onslaught of the intolerant, then the tolerant will be destroyed, and tolerance with them." Bartender at punk bar: "you have to ignore their (the Nazis) reasonable arguments because their end goal is to be terrible, awful people."

Summary of the Rules

  1. This group will not tolerate racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, Nazis, or hate speech which will be determined at the sole discretion of the moderators.
  2. If you are experiencing hate speech or harassment, please report it to the moderators.
  3. Consent matters. Use content warnings (CW) often and always where required (see details above)
  4. NSFW content is allowed behind CW banners
  5. Be respectful of others
  6. No harassment or stalking
  7. No posting or sharing another user's personal information
  8. No excessive posting of advertisements or requesting for cash (see details above)

Note on Privacy

Posts made public are replicated on servers across the fediverse. Your content may spread further than you expect.

"Direct messages" (which are @ only posts) are not end-to-end encrypted and sit on servers of the users mentioned unencrypted. If you need secure truly private conversations we suggest you DM a means to communicate using a more secure channel outside of the fediverse.

This is the breakdown of known stored information and who can see it:

  • username
    • used to identify you here on the server and with @connectop.us identifies you in the fediverse
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • email address
    • used to send you notifications, restore access to your account, identify you for login
    • moderators and technical admins
  • ip address (public facing ip only)
    • used by the server to prevent flooding attacks, may appear in mastodon logs for up to 2 days, may appear in web server logs for 7 or more days depending on the amount of server traffic
    • accessible to the moderators (for up to 2 days) and technical admins
  • date/time joined
    • used to show on your profile
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • date/time of last activity
    • used for maintaining sessions, used for server statistics
    • moderators and technical admins
  • interface language
    • used for server statistics
    • moderators and technical admins
  • password
    • used to log you into the system, stored hashed in the mastodon database
    • the hash could be accessed by admins but there is no reason they would do so
  • 2FA status
    • used to log you into the system, status (enabled/disabled) for user administration
    • moderators and technical admins
  • number of posts
    • used for system statistics, used for system administration, shown on profile
    • the public, moderators and technical admins
  • size in bytes of media attachements
    • used for system statistics, used for system administration
    • moderators and technical admins
  • number of followers
    • used for system statistics, used for system administration, shown on profile
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • number of users following you
    • shown on profile
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • number of time you made post or user moderation reports
    • used for system statistics, used for system administration
    • moderators and technical admins
  • number of times other users reported you or your posts for moderation
    • used for system statistics, used for system administration
    • moderators and technical admins
  • profile text and links
    • used to show on your profile
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • usernames of followers
    • used to show on your profile, can be hidden in user settings
    • the public (if shown) and technical admins
  • usernames of users you follow
    • used to show on your profile, can be hidden in user settings
    • the public (if shown) and technical admins
  • public posts
    • used to show on your profile
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • unlisted posts
    • used to show on your profile but excluded from explore/discovery
    • the public, moderators, and technical admins
  • followers only posts
    • used to show to your followers, stored in this server and the servers of your followers
    • your followers, moderators (local and on remote servers), and technical admins(local and remote)
  • mentioned users only posts
    • used to show to the users mentioned, stored in this server and the servers of the users mentioned
    • the users mentioned, moderators (local and on remote servers), and technical admins(local and remote)

Description:
Welcome!

inductive.space is a tiny Mastodon server for me and friendly people who like programming languages, free software, urbanism or just want to hang out.

It's run by me, Eisfunke. This is very much not a professional operation, but rather a hobby project running from my homeserver. I try my best, I do know my way around server stuff, I keep off-site backups et cetera, but still, please adjust your expectations.

Software

inductive.space runs glitch-soc, which is a fork of of Mastodon's development version with some additional features, such as Markdown posting and more. It can potentially be a little less stable than "normal" Mastodon, so bear with us if something breaks (hasn't happened so far). We also have a higher post length limit of 2520 characters.

This instance follow various other instances and hashtags via relay.fedi.buzz fitting to the instance focus topics listed below. This means the federated timeline you'll see here will contain a lot of stuff from these topics.

The instance runs on NixOS and is configured via NixOS. The configuration running on my server is public and FOSS, you can take a look at it on my GitLab.

Please read the rules

If you want to join, please read and follow the rules below. The Berlin Code of Conduct applies here. I'm committed to make this a friendly, cozy and inductive space for all kinds of people.

Is this the instance for me?

It might be! This is a very small and not a professional server mainly geared to my own usage, and you should consider the downsides of that.

Being small also has upsides though, e.g. we can easily keep a low profile and stay out of fediverse drama. Also, our federated feed is curated (see above) to the server focus topics (see below). It's also more personal – ideally, I want this server to feel like a digital living room to have fun in. It's probably not well suited as a professional forum or something like that.

This might be a good instance for you if you're interested in any of the following:

  • programming languages, types, (theoretical) computer science (as you might have guessed from the domain)
  • free software
  • any kind of science or tech in general
  • urban planning, urbanism, bikes, criticism of car-centric design, maps, OpenStreetMap
  • politics, sociology: from digital privacy over capitalism-critical economics and critical theory to feminism
  • books, podcasts
  • travelling, hiking
  • the people already here

This is probably not a good instance for you if you're politcally conservative, libertarian or right-wing, if you strongly dislike any of the above or if you just want to fight with people who like any of the above.

If I think your posts don't fit well into the instance's community and culture I might ask for you to look for an instance that fits you better, even if you don't explicitly break any rules.

If all that stuff hasn't put you off, and you'd like to participate, feel free to send a join request!

Fediblock Policy

I'm keeping up with the tier 0 blocklist from the oliphant.social blocklists. That keeps out the baseline of Nazi instances and similar stuff.

Apart from that, I mostly only block (a.k. suspend or defederate) instances if they cause problems. Part of the luxury of being a small instance with few people with similar interests is that we're only really interacting with a focused slice of fedi anyway. If you need a sturdier blocklist or an instance in a more curated slice of fedi, you're probably better off on another server.

Disclaimer

This instance is still quite new, and I'm new to the business of running a Mastodon instance, so please bear with me. I'm open to feedback, constructive criticism and suggestions regarding the instance and the rules.

However, please remember that this isn't a democracy in the end, rule interpretation and final decisions will be done by me. The great thing about the fediverse is that if you disagree with my decisions, you can always look for an instance you'd be happier on.

Custom Emoji

  • Neocat by Volpeon (license: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)
  • Neofox by Volpeon (license: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)

Imprint
Short: A tiny server for me and friendly people who like programming languages, free software, urbanism or just want to hang out.

Description: Маленький островок приватности в огромном океане корпоративной лжи, лицемерия и наплевательства на человеческие свободы.

はじめに

ご利用の前に、以下を御覧ください。 - この Mastodon インスタンスのルール ページ - 以下に続く yude.jp 全体の利用規約

yude が実験的に提供している Mastodon インスタンスです。予告なくサービスが一時的なメンテナンス状態に移行することがあります。

yude.jp サービス利用規約

yude.jp ドメイン以下に設置されているサービスについて、以下の利用規約が適用されます。

サービス運用について

yude が実験的に運用しており、完全に無保証で提供されるものです。 事前の予告なくサーバーのメンテナンスを行う場合など、予告なくサービスの提供が一時停止、または永久に停止されることがあります。

禁止行為

以下の行為を、yude.jp で提供されるサービスにおいて行うことを禁止します。 違反が見受けられた場合、管理者またはモデレーターによってアカウントに対し何らかの処分が下される可能性があります。

  • 成人向け、またはグロテスクな画像・動画の投稿
  • 常識を逸脱した暴言
  • スパム行為
  • サーバーへのクラック行為
  • 管理者が不適切であると判断した行為 その他、サーバーの設置拠点である日本国の法律が適用されます。

その他

この利用規約は管理者が利用者に対して了承を得ず更新することができますが、その際には必ず通知を Mastodon インスタンス内、または Twitter 上 (@yudejp または @yude_jp) において行うものとします。

サーバー構成

  • Mastodon インスタンス本体: オンプレミス (日本, 鳥取県)
  • メディア: Cloudflare R2
Short: @yude@mstdn.soine.site が実験的に提供している Mastodon インスタンスです。予告なくサービスがメンテナンス状態に移行することがあります。

Description:
What is SolarSystem.social?

solarsystem.social is a Mastodon server for the planetary science community.

Who can join?

Any professional working in the field of planetary science can join, including:

  • students, postdocs, researchers, professors, engineers, and administrators,

  • institutions, societies, communities, academic journals and publishers,

  • journalists, science educators, science promoters, and the occassional well-behaved bot.

When creating an account, please let the moderator know who you are and how you fit the above criteria. If we can not verify that you are an active planetary scientist, your account will not be approved. If this server is not for you, please consider joining one of the other great communities on Mastodon, such as those listed on Academics on Mastodon.

What can you talk about?

You can post on any subject that interests you, personal or professional, including (but not limited to) planetary science!

How can I find accounts to follow?

First, check out the opt-in list of planetary science accounts on Mastodon.

Second, you can use Followgraph for Mastodon. This returns a list of accounts that are followed by the people you follow.

How is this server funded?

The administrators of this site pay for both the domain name and the hosting at masto.host. The base operating cost for a small instance of a hundred users is about two hundred dollars per year, but as the number of accounts grows, so will the cost of maintaining it. If this mastodon instance is to serve the entire planetary science community, it will require donations from its members.

How to donate?

There is no requirement to donate to create an account, but if you would like to see this community thrive, please consider setting up an appropriate donation. Break even costs for running this server would be about 1-2 dollars per year if every user contributed. We accept several types of donations:

  • Liberapay.com (recurring donations)
  • ko-fi (one-time or recurring donations)
  • PayPal (one-time donation)
  • crypto, bank transfers, other (contact admin)

All donations will be used exclusively for maintaining solarsystem.social activities. Excess funds will either be used to fund future operations or to develop additional services (such as a peertube instance, a pixelfed instance, or a matrix server, for example).

Privacy statement

We will never provide or sell any information about any of our users to any party. We do not require you to use your real name, and we encourage you to use single-use email addresses. Nevertheless, please be aware that all your posts are public, and that private messages are not end-to-end encrypted. You should expect that anything you post here will eventually be consumed by data scrapers and search engines. We host this server using masto.host, but even though they also respect your privacy, data breaches can occur. If you need to communicate with someone privately, please use an end-to-end encrypted messenger.
Short: A Mastodon server for the planetary science community.

Description:
ABOUT US

Welcome to a Fediverse Foundation Mastodon Server!
You can find out more about our non-profit association here: fediverse.foundation

OUR RULESET

You can find the set of rules a little further down in the "Server Rules" tab or directly in our wiki in the area of the server rules of our instances (de/en).

No AI / ML clause

It is prohibited to use any data or content from the instances listen below for training of or developing any artificial intelligence or machine learning model without obtaining explicit consent from the copyright owner. Any unauthorized use of data or content for AI/ML purposes will be considered a violation of copyright laws and may result in legal action.

Moderated languages

Regardless of political orientation, our moderators try to moderate all posts equally and objectively in accordance with our server rules. Of course, this is only possible for languages that we understand - therefore only German and English are possible as languages on our instances. In case of doubt, we reserve the right to restrict or delete messages in other languages.

DATA PROTECTION

Please also refer to our wiki for our disclosure regarding data protection in the privacy policy section (de/en).

Federation with Meta (Facebook) / Instagram

Our servers have preemptively blocked federation with threads.net. This rule might be changed in the future, when we know how threads.net implements federation via ActivityPub and how they act on reports coming from the Fediverse.

TECHNICAL AND ORGANIZATIONAL MEASURES

The Fediverse Foundation offers are run as a non-profit association and in our free time. We do not generate any income with the offer and finance ourselves from donations and our own funds. We reserve the right to restrict or terminate the service at any time for legal, technical or financial reasons.

Otherwise the following applies:

  • This server adheres to the agreements for Mastodon server operators: Server Covenant
  • You can also find our technical and organizational measures in our wiki in the area of technical and organizational measures (de/en).

DONATIONS & TRANSPARENCY

We provide the services of the Fediverse Foundation free of advertising and tracking on a voluntary basis in our free time. We offer our services to all users free of charge. If you would like to support us, you can do so in the form of a voluntary donation. The money primarily covers domain, server, electricity and hardware costs.<

MODERATION & ORGANIZATION

  • @PaulaToThePeople
  • General questions: support@fediverse.foundation

TECHNICAL ADMINISTRATION

  • @fossie
  • @b2c

Sources

  • BirdUI theme from https://mementomori.social/@rolle
  • TangerineUI theme from https://https://nileane.fr/@nileane

IMPRINT

Fediverse Foundation
Sillerplatz 8
1130 Vienna
Austria
ZVR: 1121443789
Email: support@fediverse.foundation
Short: Fediverse/Mastodon instance for all things Magic The Gathering

Kwick (Eigenschreibweise KWICK!) war eine Online-Community mit Sitz in Weinstadt (Baden-Württemberg). Mit Stand 2017 hatte die Plattform nach eigenen Angaben rund eineinhalb Millionen registrierte Benutzer, vornehmlich aus Süddeutschland, und rangierte bezüglich der Unique User unter den zehn größten der sozialen Netzwerke in Deutschland. 2019 wurde der Betrieb komplett eingestellt.

Dieser Server hat damit nichts zu tun.

Description:
从2001到2024，沿着时光的弧线，紫风铃是那个曾经我们的时代的见证者，在这里，每一个声音都如音符般弥漫，每一个故事如彩虹一般丰富多彩。与旧友重逢，与新友相伴，时光继续，故事未完。

站内圈养了几只乖巧的机器人，仅发布少量公开嘟文，关注后接收全部推送。

  • 微信公众号搬运工 ：@weixin@zifengling.com ChatGPT魔法加持，不定时转发微信公众号精选文章。

  • 36氪 ：@36kr@zifengling.com 独家的视角为用户深度剖析最前沿的资讯，让一部分人先看到未来。

  • 靠谱新闻 ：@kaopu@zifengling.com 更新来自纽约时报、华尔街日报、金融时报等权威媒体的靠谱中文新闻。

  • FT热门文章 ：@ftchinese@zifengling.com 金融时报向中国商业菁英和企业决策者及时提供来自全球的商业、经济、市场、管理和科技新闻。

  • 知乎热榜 ：@zhihu@zifengling.com 有问题就会有答案，帮助人们便捷地分享彼此的知识、经验和见解。

  • 雪球热帖 ： @xueqiu@zifengling.com 发现投资好机会，定时转发雪球热帖。

  • 必应每日一图 ： @bing@zifengling.com 必应壁纸每日一图，带您领略世界之美。

  • NASA中文每日一图 ：@nasa@zifengling.com 每天发布一张迷人的宇宙影像，以及由专业天文学家撰写的简要说明，带你探索神秘宇宙。

紫风铃时光机：https://bbs.zifengling.com
Short: 与旧友重逢，与新友相伴，时光继续，故事未完。

مرحباً

خادم ماستودون لمجتمع م.ع.ل+ العربي

يركز هذا الخادم على العرب أو متحدثي العربية بكل لهجاتها او الأشخاص من جنوب غرب آسيا وشمال افريقيا من المثليات.ين.يت*، متعددي التوجه الجنسي، العابرات.ين.يت، اللاجنسيات.ين.يت، اللاجندرييت، اللامعيارايي الجندر، بينيي الجنس، او أي شخص يعيش تجارب جنسية وجندرية مختلفة. التسجيل متاح لأي شخص عمره فوق 18 من أي مكان في العالم.

يمكنك مشاركة ما شئت أو ما ترتاح لمشاركته مع الفيديفيرس في هذا الخادم بأي لغة أو لهجة بما يتوافق مع قواعد الخادم، سواء أردت التحدث عن التقنية أو السياسة أو الطبخ أو حتى مشاركة صورك العارية فهذا مرحب به.

يرجى مشاركة سبب رغبتك بالانضمام عند التسجيل.

* لاحقة ـيت تستخدم للجمع حيادي الجندر

  • سكس توك بالعربي: https://thesextalkarabic.com/

Description:
Anarres is the moon of Urras inhabited by Anarresti who defected to the desert-climate moon almost two centuries ago, shepherded there by their leader Odo, who envisioned an anarcho-syndicalist society free of the constraints of capitalism.

This server is for all those rebels, misfits, round pegs in square holes who want a better server by working together in an anarcho-syndicalist style to manage this instance.

It is funded by the admin, hosted in Europe and thus covered by all European Laws & Regulations, specifically also of Germany.

But please read the rules, especially rule #8 before asking for an account here.

If you would like an account here, please contact any of the members/moderators. Since all members are also moderators, you can get in touch with any member here.

Clarification of use of posts from this server (2023-07-31)

You can read, respond, boosts, and perform any such activity as done on the Fediverse on posts/toots from this server.

However: any commercial use, regardless of whether you want to sell any content or whether you want to offer any service in which posts from this server are involved are STRICTLY FORBIDDEN. You may not, directly or indirectly, base your commercial business partly or wholly on the use of any post/toot, media, or data from this server.

Please note: all data on this server is covered by German Laws and especially the copyright is based on German "Urheberrechtsgesetz": this means, there is no "irrevocable right to use"! German "Urheberrechtsgesetz" doesn't know or accept "irrevocable". There is no such thing in German Law. The original creator can revoke such permission any time they deem you are misusing their content.

Also: if you receive consent from one user on this server to peruse one of their posts for commercial purposes, THIS DOES NOT MEAN ALL USERS AND/OR ALL POSTS. Consent is required for any commercial use of any data from this server for each data item separately.

Lastly: any scraping of content of any type from this server is strictly prohibited. You are only permitted to use content from this server for "Standard Fediverse Activities", such as reading, replying, starring, bookmarking, etc. Any copying of content from this server outside of "Standard Fediverse Activity" is strictly prohibited. And if you are unsure whether your intended use is "Standard Fediverse Activity", then it probably is NOT.

Crawling the content of the instance and creating a database of its posts and content for the purposes of archiving, searching, or analyzing is strictly prohibited.

And just to be clear: the admin of this server will never tolerate any misuse or unlicensed use of content/data from this server!

Emojis used on this server

Blobcat (CC0 license) by various artists

Blobfox (Apache License 2.0) by Volpeon

Blobhaj (CC BY-SA 4.0) by HeatherHorns

Neocat (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license) by Volpeon

Neofox (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license) by Volpeon

Neobread (CC BY-NC-SA license) by olyvvybee

drgn (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license) by Volpeon

Pride Butterflies (CC0 license) by FrazzledBrynn

Queercat (CC0) by ZoeBijl

Infinity Pride (CC-NC-SA license) by Rick Osborne

CAT IS BLOB (CC0) by Elke

SeviCat ([1]) by Sevi

Sora (Red Panda) ([1]) by Sora

[1] Specific permission for use on a per server basis for their users. With each being required to purchase.
Short: This server is for Anarresti only, i.e. for rebels, misfits, round pegs in square holes. It is run in an anarcho-syndicalist style. Membership on invitation only.

Description:
A digital tree in a federated garden. A calm, welcoming place to talk about pretty much anything, but especially interested in technology, music, and films/TV.

What do I do here? Orchard is a Mastodon instance. Mastodon is a federated platform for microblogging.

What's federation? Federation refers to the platform's ability to communicate with other servers and platforms through a shared protocol, in this case ActivityPub. Basically, imagine a world where all of your social media apps were interconnected, and you could get content on your platform from a different one.

What tools do I have to protect myself from harassment? We want to make Orchard feel like a safe place to be. At least, relatively safe, in a social media context. If someone slips past Orchard's moderation, you have a range of tools to combat trolls and harassment on the platform. To stop seeing posts from someone, you have the ability to filter them, mute them, or block them completely. To limit the ability for you to be targeted, you have the options of opting out of discovery, hiding your social graph, or making your profile private. For each post, you can also change the visibility. You're also encouraged to report any bad actors to us.


Server Specs
Hetzner CAX41, Falkenstein
- 16 vCPUs Ampere Altra
- 32GB DDR4 ECC Memory
- 320GB NVMe SSD Storage
BuyVM Block Storage (Media)
- 1024GB HDD behind NVMe SSD buffer
Short: A digital tree in a federated garden. A calm, welcoming place to talk about pretty much anything, but especially interested in technology, music, and films/TV.

Description:

This online community celebrates the film and the inspirational real-life stories behind it. We invite you to join in the conversation.
Short: #OnBoardTheFilm follows the evolution of board diversity from 1971 to present day as seen through the eyes of Black women. This is a space for the community that's formed around the film.

Description:
tuebingen.network ist eine Mastodon-Instanz für alle aus Tübingen und Umgebung. Betrieben und Moderiert vom Chaostreff Tübingen (www.cttue.de), meldet euch bei Fragen & Anregungen gerne bei uns.

Regeln/Rules

(hier nur nochmals auf english aufgeführt, die deutschen Regeln sind unter dem Reiter Server Regeln/Server Rules einzusehen)

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

  • Obviously: no content that is illegal in Germany, no actions intended to damage this instance (performance, reputation, security).
  • Harrassment, stalking, doxxing
  • Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading
  • Untagged advertisement
  • Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement
  • sexual content or gore
  • No automated accounts (unless approved by the moderators). This includes bots, crossposters, feedposters etc.

Impressum

Chaostreff Tübingen
Wöhrdstraße 25
72072 Tübingen (GERMANY)
Short:
tuebingen.network ist eine Mastodon-Instanz für alle aus Tübingen und Umgebung. 
Betrieben und Moderiert vom Chaostreff Tübingen (www.cttue.de), meldet euch bei Fragen & Anregungen gerne bei uns.

Description:
🪦 WELCOME TO SHADOW'S REST 🪦

🕸️ Please find an empty mausoleum, a dusty corner of a crypt, or a threadbare blanket under the looming oak, and make yourself at home. One of our reanimated will be along shortly with a Welcome Urn packed with delightful treats.

🦇 Our library of dusty tomes is extensive, and our Alchemical Alcove beyond reproach. Head to the Slumbering Stone if you need a nap in one of the cushion-stuffed alcoves, or pop into Bitterbones Inn for hushed whispers over bubbling brews.

🐈‍⬛ Claiming a plot in Shadow's Rest requires being cordially invited by the Shadow Figure. If you are known to the Shadow Figure, please send inquisitive tendrils through the whispy void to require of available plot space.

🖤 RULES OF THE GROUND 🖤

If you are here, it's because I know and trust you, and we share the same values and principles. However, in conjunction with the rules outlined below, for the sake of clarity, and for those peering through the bars of our rusted wrought-iron gate:

  • No microagressions, trolling, harassment, block evasion, abuse, or setting your skeletal army on a rampage.
  • No hate speech, bigotry (racism, colourism, sexism, queermisia, ableism, xenophobia, antisemitism), or judging another inhabitant's connection to the Underworld.
  • Respect your cryptneighbours' boundaries. Be respectful and sincerely apologize if someone informs you that a boundary has been crossed. Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary.
  • Though denizens of Shadow's Rest all share a connection to the macabre, please tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, graphic nudity, lewd content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics and hide them under a Content Warning (CW).
  • No advertising, spam, unapproved bots, or Automated Arisen Cryptknockers.
  • No Cryptocurrency, NFTs, AI-generated content, or Scam Ghouls.

🥀 Ultimately, moderation is at the Shadow Figure's discretion and handled on a case-by-case basis regardless of whether any of the rules above have been specifically broken.

🐺 That said, I would like to run this instance somewhat democratically where all inhabitants of Shadow's Rest have input on how our grounds are maintained.

🦉 FRIENDS OF THE REST 🦉

Shadow's Rest allows visitors at our discretion, and prohibits entry to any instance that contravenes our core rules or that we just don't vibe with.

Our instance blocklist is copied from mastodon.art, with some extra additions to keep our space small and cozy.
Short: Shadow's Rest is a cozy space for lovers of gothic vibes and wholesome necromancy, run by WelshPixie.

Description:
This is a radical left (Marxist-Leninist/anarcho-communist/adjacent) server, with emphasis on leftist inter-tendency discussion, and de-facto obligatory furry discourse.

Folks popping into this instance might be confused by some of the extreme positions that much of our community holds. They might consider defederation. That's fine, and RPC members should be aware that this will happen.

But if you want to try to figure out why we have good things to say about Stalin, or have the flag of the Workers Party of Korea as an emoji, or unabashedly support organized violence against the capitalist class, you can talk to me.

Funding

I (Comrade Ferret) am paying for this server myself. But if you like it, or you like the other things I do, you can send me a buck or two at http://www.ko-fi.com/comradeferret

Discord

RPC originated as a Discord server. We have active discussions, democratic server decisionmaking, a leftist theory book club, weekly movie nights, and fluff.

https://discord.gg/HgbpXMZPR4
Short: This is a radical left (Marxist-Leninist/anarcho-communist/adjacent) server, with emphasis on leftist inter-tendency discussion, and de-facto obligatory furry discourse.

Description:
Wikimedia Social is the official Mastodon instance for the Wikimedia Foundation, and is currently open for registration to Wikimedia staff members.

The Wikimedia Foundation is the nonprofit organization that operates Wikipedia and other Wikimedia free knowledge projects. Our vision is a world in which every single human can freely share in the sum of all knowledge. We believe that everyone has the potential to contribute something to our shared knowledge, and that everyone should be able to access that knowledge freely. We host Wikipedia and the Wikimedia projects, build software experiences for reading, contributing, and sharing Wikimedia content, support the volunteer communities and partners who make Wikimedia possible, and advocate for policies that enable Wikimedia and free knowledge to thrive.

The Wikimedia Foundation is a charitable, not-for-profit organization that relies on donations. We receive donations from millions of individuals around the world, with an average donation of about $15. We also receive donations through institutional grants and gifts. The Wikimedia Foundation is a United States 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization with offices in San Francisco, California, USA.

This instance, as well as the official Mastodon account, is managed by the Wikimedia Foundation’s Product & Technology Department. The instance will be primarily used as a space for people to connect and talk about tech related topics. We will also experiment with content about the Wikimedia movement and projects that might be appealing to tech enthusiasts and fans of open-source platforms.

Friendly space policy

To maintain a harassment-free online space, we enforce the Wikimedia Foundation’s friendly space policy and the Wikimedia movement's Universal Code of Conduct. When you join us in conversations on Mastodon or any other social media channel, please respect both.

We do not tolerate any form of harassment, which includes any behavior intended primarily to intimidate, outrage, or upset. We also do not tolerate any behavior where this would reasonably be considered the most likely main outcome. This includes (but is not limited to) offensive comments or imagery related to gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, physical appearance, age, race, ethnicity, political affiliation, national origin, or religion. This also includes insults, threats, and trolling.

Any comments, messages, images, or other communications found in violation by Wikimedia Foundation staff will be hidden or deleted, and offenders may be blocked.
Short: Wikimedia Social is the official Mastodon instance for the Wikimedia Foundation.

Description:
Hewwo!

Welcome to hewwo.space, an inclusive Mastodon instance that celebrates diversity and fosters a vibrant community. Our server is proudly LGBTQIA+ friendly, creating a safe and accepting space for individuals of all gender identities and sexual orientations. Whether you're a furry, a techie, or a passionate member of the railway community, you'll find a warm home here.

We believe in the power of connection and aim to bring people together through shared interests and meaningful conversations. Our multi-fandom environment encourages open dialogue and encourages creativity, making it an ideal platform for artists, writers, and enthusiasts to showcase their talents and find like-minded individuals.

At hewwo.space, we value linguistic diversity and embrace both English and German languages. Feel free to express yourself in the language you're most comfortable with!

Our dedicated team is committed to maintaining a respectful and safe online environment. We actively moderate the instance to prevent harassment, discrimination, or any form of harmful behavior.

Discover new friendships, engage in stimulating discussions, and share your unique perspective with an inclusive and welcoming audience. Together, let's build a positive and inclusive online space that empowers and celebrates our differences.

We are glad that you are here!

Federation Policy

At hewwo.space, we strive to federate with instances that promote a respectful and inclusive atmosphere, backed by strong moderation policies. We actively monitor public timelines to ensure compliance with our guidelines. Instances found to be sharing content that violates our policies may be subject to silencing or suspension, depending on the severity of the violation.

If you feel that your instance has been suspended unjustly, please contact us via the admin email provided above. We are committed to maintaining fairness and addressing any concerns promptly.

Hosting costs

The cost of hewwo.space is approximately 16€ per month. If you like to support us, you are welcome to do so. Just send us an email and we will give you all further information.

The cover image of this instance takes resources from Freepik.
Short: An LGBTQIA+ friendly instance open to furries, techies, and the railway community. German & English spoken. Join hewwo.social today!

Description:
Description

Welcome to 3615.computer, a queer, neurodivergent, nerds space available for you or anyone else respectful and understanding.

Why do we exist?

Alyx just wanted her owner Mastodon's instance at first.

But with such a cool domain, she had to make a community 👥. It's always something she dreamed of, creating a space, standing back, and see it flourishing with lovely people.

Registrations are ~open~ on approval at the moment, because of the recent spam wave. Ask for one, you should be accepted without any issues 😊

Services

  • 🌐 Main web page: home.3615.computer
  • 🐘 Mastodon instance: 3615.computer
    • 📣 3615.computer/@team Team account for announcements
    • 💬 Telegram channel to discuss and send updates during an incident
    • 🚨 status.3615.computer to let everyone know what's going on during a technical incident

Information

  • 🏳️‍🌈 Alyx (he/she) is the owner of the organization. See her profile.
  • 📧 3615.computer contact: contact@3615.computer

Community

Any constructive feedback will be positive for us. If we can't do better, for sure we will.

Privacy

See our privacy policy.

Hosting

  • 3615.computer is hosted on Fly.io (CDG region)
    • We use CloudFlare R2 for objects storage (media/S3-like)
  • home.3615.computer is hosted on carrd.co
  • status.3615.computer is self-hosted at my place.

We use CloudFlare for our DNS.

Common Hashtags

  • (#3615apéro)https://3615.computer/tags/3615ap%C3%A9ro: a hashtag used to chill and discuss with others. It means that you want to get interactions on your post. Take a drink and talk with the community!
  • (#3615aide)https://3615.computer/tags/3615aide: do you need help with something, anything? The community might help you!
  • (#3615zinzin)https://3615.computer/tags/3615aide: sometimes, we need to share our mental health issues, eventually get advice, or just support from the community. The community might interact with you. If you don't want that, we understand, just say so explicitly.

Staff

  • @Team

Owners

  • @Alyx

Moderators

  • @Alyx
  • @eveningsempire
Short:
3615.computer is a bit of a nerdy name, but we are welcoming everyone. Actually, we don't want "just another nerd instance". The name was too cool to not use it.
More at: https://home.3615.computer

Description:
🦄 Welcome to kopimi.space

kopimi.space is a small and stable Mastodon server for people to find new friends and have a lot of fun. We are not tied to a specific topic, but mostly focus on DRM, software freedom, piracy etc. By visiting this site you agree to the terms of service below and our privacy policy.

A project by koyu.space

😀 Fediverse Friendly Moderation Covenant

This instance commits to the following

1. Administration and Moderation will be handled as neutral as possible

Reports and widespread information on specific instances (often known as bad actors) will be verified and actions might be taken as necessary.

2. Actions taken will respond to the bare minimum to keep the network operating and not influence the ability of the instances users to connect to other people

  • If another instance spreads media content of questionable legality for the region the current instance is operating from, these files might be rejected from being saved.
  • If another instance is sharing hateful messages that impact local users, there might be consideration of silencing that specific instance from being visible in timelines. If users follow and/or wish to follow users on the target instance, they are still free to do so.
  • If another instance is posting content illegal in the local instance operation region or actively posts content attacking local users, a full instance block might be the last resort.

3. Communication before Actions

If any of the above behaviours start to surface from a given instance, the moderation of the local instance will attempt to inform the moderation/administration of that instance and resolve the problems coming from there. Only if no communication succeeded or no results that resolved issues came forth, actions will be taken towards that instance.

4. We won't recommend blocks

Blocklists and block recommendations as an information source are taken for granted but lack accurate verification. Instead of using these options to publicly announce instances of questionable intent, we will inform local users of such, with the reminder of possible personal options for hiding content that might impact their experience of the network.

5. No Guilt-by-Association/Federation

If we have applied any action against Instance X, an Instance Y that federates with them will not get the same judgement applied to them. A natural connection, as by the networks design, does not imply shared interests and thus doesn't warrant the same moderation methods.

Regardless of all given points above, in special cases the instance moderation/administration might still opt to block an instance, while this is tried to be avoided at most.

This Covenant is based on The Fediverse-Friendly Moderation Covenant and is licensed under CC0
Short: kopimi.space is a small and stable Mastodon server for people to find new friends and have a lot of fun. We are not tied to a specific topic, but mostly focus on DRM, software freedom, piracy etc.

Description:
FAIRPHONE

social.fairphone.community is an instance initiated and run by Fairphone Angels, enthusiasts and activists from the fairphone.community – for everyone interested in Fairphone. social.fairphone.community is independent of and not endorsed by the company Fairphone B.V.(fairphone.com) or any of its employees.

ABOUT US

Welcome to a Fediverse Foundation Mastodon Server!
You can find out more about our non-profit association here: fediverse.foundation

DONATIONS & TRANSPARENCY

We provide the services of the Fediverse Foundation free of advertising and tracking on a voluntary basis in our free time. We offer our services to all users free of charge. If you would like to support us, you can do so in the form of a voluntary donation. The money primarily covers domain, server, electricity and hardware costs.

  • Fediverse Foundation - Donations and Disclosure
    • IBAN: AT54 2011 1849 4974 3900
  • Fediverse Foundation - PayPal


Thank you for your support!

OUR RULESET

You can find the set of rules a little further down in the "Server Rules" tab or directly in our wiki in the area of the server rules of our instances (de/en).

No AI / ML clause

It is prohibited to use any data or content from the instances listen below for training of or developing any artificial intelligence or machine learning model without obtaining explicit consent from the copyright owner. Any unauthorized use of data or content for AI/ML purposes will be considered a violation of copyright laws and may result in legal action.

Moderated languages

Regardless of political orientation, our moderators try to moderate all posts equally and objectively in accordance with our server rules. Of course, this is only possible for languages that we understand - therefore only German and English are possible as languages on our instances. In case of doubt, we reserve the right to restrict or delete messages in other languages.

DATA PROTECTION

Please also refer to our wiki for our disclosure regarding data protection in the privacy policy section (de/en).

Federation with Meta (Facebook) / Instagram

Our servers have preemptively blocked federation with threads.net. This rule might be changed in the future, when we know how threads.net implements federation via ActivityPub and how they act on reports coming from the Fediverse.

TECHNICAL AND ORGANIZATIONAL MEASURES

The Fediverse Foundation offers are run as a non-profit association and in our free time. We do not generate any income with the offer and finance ourselves from donations and our own funds. We reserve the right to restrict or terminate the service at any time for legal, technical or financial reasons.

Otherwise the following applies:

  • This server adheres to the agreements for Mastodon server operators: Server Covenant
  • You can also find our technical and organizational measures in our wiki in the area of technical and organizational measures (de/en).

MODERATION & ORGANIZATION

  • @PaulaToThePeople
  • General questions: support@fediverse.foundation

TECHNICAL ADMINISTRATION

  • @fossie
  • @b2c

Attributions

  • BirdUI theme from https://mementomori.social/@rolle
  • TangerineUI theme from https://https://nileane.fr/@nileane

IMPRINT

Fediverse Foundation
Sillerplatz 8
1130 Vienna
Austria
ZVR: 1121443789
Email: support@fediverse.foundation
Short: A Mastodon/Fediverse server for the Fairphone community

Description:
Who It's For

BlackQueerLife is meant to be a welcoming community for all Black queer, trans, and gender nonconforming people. Another way of saying this is that this space exists to house the following people: (note-these categories are not mutually exclusive and this list is not necessarily exhaustive either) Black MaGes/Black people of marginalized genders, Black folks who are marginalized due to their sexuality, Black intersex folks, Black aro/ace people, Black gender-nonconforming folks, Black people who question their sexuality and/or gender.

Black folks who are multiply marginalized (disabled Black people, fat Black people, or dark-skinned Black people for example) are also welcome here, keeping in mind that the Black queer community is centered.

How To Sign Up

When you click the create an account button, after verifying your email address, in the box that asks why you want to join, please let us know a little bit about yourself. While you do not have to share any information you don't want to, keep in mind what is written above in the Who It's For section. We will only be approving requests to join that align with that. Please allow for some time to allow us to process your application. If your application is not accepted and you don't know why, contact me using the email above. I will explain why and work with you if there was a mistake.

Guiding Principles and Moderation Practices

This is an explicitly anti-imperialist, anti-fascist, and anti-capitalist instance that subscribes to the following political philosophies: Black liberation, gender expansiveness, disability justice, fat liberation, class warfare, prison abolition, and more.

Therefore any actions taken by users that align with white supremacy, antiblackness, colorism, ableism, transmisia, misogyny, fat hate, gender binarism, or cissexism/heterosexism will be addressed. Warnings, post deletion, silencing, and suspension are all on the table when it comes to moderation.

We also proactively use blocklists. Our blocklist was originally based on the Tier 2 Blocklist, as per Oliphant's page here, although we are currently using the 40% Heat Rating list on The Bad Space as our main source going forward. We also regularly monitor the Fediblock hashtag and are in frequent communication with other server admins to keep our blocklist current and our users safe.

Additionally, we abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant. This means that we commit to the following:

-Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia

-Daily backups

-At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure

-Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down

Sibling Instances

These are instances whose mod/admin teams we work very closely with, given our shared vision and goals for building a safer fediverse for marginalized groups and oppressed peoples. Think of us as different houses in the same neighborhood.

These instances are as follows:

artcrimes.gay

diaspora.im

h-i.social

Why This Server?

Mastodon in particular and the fediverse at large can be an extremely hostile place for people like us. The safety of our community is something we take extremely seriously. As such, this server will be a place of heavy moderation. It should be noted, however, that we will federate. There are other spaces that do not federate that we can recommend for you. Those spaces are going to be more safe and more private by default.

My intention for BlackQueerLife is that when Black queers are searching for a place in the fediverse to call home, we are accessible to them. The goal is to strike that challenging balance between safety for current users and being accessible to new users. This is far from an easy task, and should events force the server to temporarily close to new signups you will be notified. If we grow to the point where taking on more members is no longer feasible permanently, you will also be notified of this change.

I do not believe that our community should be forced to choose between making a home on an instance that centers whiteness and making a home on an instance that is closed off from the rest of fedi. I believe that our community should have options that federate and those that don't.

Best Practices For Accessibility

Some of our users are disabled (For example, 1 in 4 Black American adults), and to make sure that everyone is provided with the tools they need to participate fully in our community, here are some collective habits that we should adopt:

  • Alt-text your images. If you are not in a position to do so, please use #AltTextHelp and someone from the community should be able to help and provide it. Another tag you can use,#ALT4me, lets you ask for an alt text for your image and #ALT4you or #ALT4U can be used in the comments to indicate to the OP that you've written an ALT text for them to add to their image
  • Avoid using too many emojis in a row. Example: putting 3 smiley faces in a row, or 60 red flags. Screen readers do not handle them well
  • Use PascalCase for the hashtags. Example: #BlackQueerLife
  • When sharing a link, provide a brief description of where the link directs to
  • Use captions in uploaded videos

(These best practices were inspired by disabled.social. Thanks!)

Server Details

This server is running Glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon, using the managed hosting provider, Fedi Monster. You can see more information by going to their page, but daily backups and regular updates are included.

If you would like to support our server, we are partnered with Open Collective. You can find our donation page here!

The instance is currently run by one admin and two moderators. Our team regularly collaborates on making decisions for the server. Our moderators are also compensated for their labor. For the time being, we are not looking to expand our mod team.
Short: You guessed it, this server is for Black queer folks to relax, spread out, and be themselves. This is BlackQueerLife.

Occult.town is open and welcoming of queer & trans practitioners, plural practitioners, practitioners of colour, folks that come from closed practices & Jewish practitioners, & similar.

We take an anti-appropriation stance and you can find out more about that in our rules! Our instance is explicitly anti-fascist, anti-nationalist, anti-TERF/transphobe/transmisogyny, and anti-all of their friends. No cops, no three letter agencies, no military.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.

Interledger.social is the official fediverse home for the Interledger Foundation. People interested in the foundation, Interledger Protocol, Open Payments API, and Web Monetization API are welcome to join this server.

Account requests are reviewed manually to prevent abuse. Please list the email address you use on community.interledger.org when requesting an account.

The Interledger Foundation and its community are building pathways to financial access and opportunity across the world, connecting humanity in a new way. With the ultimate goals of strengthening its presence globally, fostering access and community engagement, and enabling infrastructures that will inclusively serve communities around the globe.

Moderation

See the rules. In general, we align with the Mozilla.social content policies.

Operation

This server abides by the Mastodon covenant.

Legal, GDPR, DMCA: email info at interledger.org

Funding

This server is operated by the Interledger Foundation, a non-profit 501(c)(3) organization.

Description:
판돌토돈 서버는 마스토돈 서버 규약에 따르며 아래 내용이 추가됩니다.

나이 제한

판돌토돈은 만 16세 미만의 미성년자는 사용할 수 없습니다.

금지 사항

이 인스턴스에서는 아래 행위를 금지하고 있습니다.

  • 다음에 해당하는 컨텐츠를 NSFW / CW 표시 없이 로컬 타임라인에 포스팅하지 마십시오.
    • 과도한 성적 묘사・잔혹 묘사가 포함된 컨텐츠
    • 과도한 빛의 반짝임이 포함되어 일부 사용자가 발작을 일으킬 수 있는 컨텐츠
    • 그 외 다른 사용자가 불쾌함을 느낄 수 있는 과격한 내용의 컨텐츠
  • 다른 사용자에 대해 모욕, 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예 훼손의 목적으로 계정을 생성하거나 컨텐츠를 포스팅하지 마십시오.
    • 인종이나 성별, 성 정체・지향성 등에 대한 헤이트 스피치
    • 아동 포르노 또는 아동을 대상으로 한 학대가 담긴 컨텐츠
    • 사이버 불링
    • 불법 촬영물 등 디지털 성범죄에 해당하는 컨텐츠
  • 이 외에도, 다음 행위는 금지됩니다.
    • 광고 등 다른 사용자들이 원치 않는 목적의 무작위 팔로잉・멘션 행위 (스팸)
    • 일회용 이메일을 사용한 계정 생성
    • 신규 사용자에게 기존 사용자간의 문화를 강요하거나 행동을 재단하려는 행위

규칙을 크게 위반하지 않아도 과도한 욕설 등 다른 사용자들이 불쾌하게 여길 수 있는 내용으로 단시간에 여러 신고가 접수될 경우, 계정을 일시/영구적으로 침묵 (Silence) 처리 할 수 있습니다.

계정이 침묵 처리 되어도 기존처럼 마스토돈 사용은 가능하지만, 공개적으로 로컬 타임라인 / 연합 타임라인에 포스팅 하는 것이 불가능해지므로 유의 바랍니다.

처벌 제도 및 예외

과도한 문제로 인한 제재 대상이 아닌 경우 처벌 제도에 대해서는 아래와 같습니다.

사용자는 규칙을 어길 시 문제가 되는 콘텐츠 / 프로필을 삭제 처리하고 처벌을 받습니다.

처벌 수위는 담당 관리자의 판단하에 결정됩니다.

이의가 있으면 사용자는 jyp0036@gmail.com으로 공개 투표를 요청할 수 있습니다.

  • 예외

    • 아래에 해당하는 경우에는 예외를 적용하고, 곧바로 계정을 정지합니다.

  • 스팸 계정

    • 상기 나이 제한 사항에 해당하는 미성년자 사용자
    • username이 예외 사항에 해당하는 경우
    • 사용자 본인이나 다른 사용자들에게 커다란 신체적・정신적 피해가 초래될 수 있다고 판단되는 경우
    • 자해 및 자살 위험이 있거나 이를 조장하는 내용
    • 과도한 수위의 헤이트 스피치
    • 사이버 불링
    • 미성년・사회적 약자에 대한 공격 및 성적 접근 행위
    • 대한민국 내에서 불법으로 취급되는 정보를 담고 있는 경우
    • 웹 브라우저・접속 기기의 보안 취약점을 사용한 XSS나 이에 상응하는 공격 행위
    • Mastodon 시스템을 악용한 서비스 거부 공격 (DoS) 등의 공격 행위
    • 판돌토돈의 규칙의 허점을 악용한 악성 어뷰징 행위

  • 예외 (사일런스)

    • 판돌토돈 로컬 / 타 인스턴스의 여러 사용자에게 여러 차례 불쾌함을 주는 행위

자동화

  • 스크립트, 크로스포스터* 등의 자동화된 수단으로 Toot을 포스팅하는 자동화된 계정 (bot)의 가동은 허용하지 않으며 위반 시 예고 없이 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.

사용자의 데이터 열람 및 무단 사용 금지

판돌토돈의 관리자들은 관리 목적 외의 사유로 타인의 데이터를 무단으로 열람하거나 사용해선 안됩니다.

그러나, 아래에 해당하거나 정당한 사유가 있는 경우 부득이하게 데이터를 열람할 수 있으며 열람 시 해당 사용자 또는 전체에게 조회 사실 및 목적에 대해 공지해야 합니다.

  • 경찰 등 국가 수사 기관에 대한 협조를 위한 DB 조회
  • Mastodon 소프트웨어 업데이트 중 발생하는 문제 해결
  • DB / 스토리지 손상으로 인한 복구 작업
Short:
저희 서버의 목적은 게임, 그림, 방송등
주로 사이버 취미생활에 초점을 맞춘 서버입니다

Description:
vorny-animals.online is a vore-oriented Mastodon instance. The general aim is for the server to be a welcoming place for friends who are currently migrating over from twitter; by providing a (hopefully) good instance as an option, some of the burden of picking out an instance can be reduced. The general vibes for the rules are "being nice" and not doing anything illegal that would put me in jail.

On that topic, if you see anything that makes you uncomfortable, please do report it. I aim to get around to any such matters, rare as I expect them to be, as quickly as I can. There is no automatic response to moderation cases here.

If you have any questions, concerns, or general thoughts, contact me via @ibzan@vorny-animals.online, or email.

I am the only person running vorny-animals.online. As such, I pay for all of the infrastructure out of my own pocket. The technology stack powering this instance is made of:

  • Mastodon
  • Redis
  • PostgreQL
  • Git
  • NixOS
  • Sendgrid
  • Terraform
  • AWS

In terms of the actual things involved, vorny-animals.online runs in an EC2 instance running NixOS, using S3 for media, PostgreSQL backups, and Terraform state. Mail is sent via Sendgrid.
Short: A vore-oriented server aimed at furries who probably know me, Ibzan.
Server to promote library socialism (https://librarysocialism.org) along with left-wing socialist causes in general
Mastodon para Nicaragua!

fedi.science in union with fediverse.science is powered by:

Die Mission des PERMANIZER-Verlages besteht darin, Projekte als permanente Bestandteile der Gesellschaft zu etablieren, die nur mit persönlichem Engagement diesseits ihrer Rentabilität angeschoben werden müssen, um später finanziell selbsttragend der Allgemeinheit größtmöglich zu nützen.

DAS NEUE UNIVERSUM (http://www.dasneueuniversum.com)

FUTURE. RESEARCH. ADVENTURE. - On the bottom of true facts and science. ZUKUNFT. FORSCHUNG. ABENTEUER. -Auf dem Boden allgemein anerkannter Fakten und Forschung. Against Fake News, against populism, against despotism, against fashism. Gegen Fakenews, gegen Populismus, gegen Despotismus, gegen Faschismus.

Special Add-On 4 German speaking people: Mit dem Erwerb eines Bandes NEUE UNIVERSUM (aktueller Band 120) im Buchhandel oder eines Bandes bzw. weiterer Produkte über deren Online-Shop unterstützen Sie deren Relaunch sowie diese Mastodon-Instanz -und erhalten als Gegenleistung ein hoch informatives und bleibend wertvolles Sammlerstück !

Description:
ZetaSpace was created to be a new social network alternative for the Zeta Community. The intent is to have a community following inline with the Zeta Principles. Not familiar? Have a look below:

The Principles of Z.E.T.A. Zoosexuals for the Ethical Treatment of Animals

  • Bestow upon animals the same kindness one would wish bestowed upon oneself. Consider the well being of an animal companion as important as ones own.

  • Place the animals will and well being ahead of ones desires for sexual gratification.

  • Teach those who seek knowledge about bestiality and zoophilia without promoting it.

  • Discourage the practice of bestiality in the presence of fetish seekers.

  • Censure sexual exploitation of animals for the purpose of financial gain.

  • Censure those who practice and promote animal sexual abuse.
Short: A community for those that are looking for a non-porn, non-meet up oriented community for Zoos. Following the ZETA Principles.

Description:
本站点欢迎你和Fediverse中不同背景，爱好的任何人友好地交流，而免于任何政府或大公司的言论审查。

在这里，你可以：

发布长达50000字符数限制的文本

不用再担心遇到字写不下，不得不开个长串的尴尬境地。

给每条posts附上最高6张媒体图片

不同客户端/网页前端支持显示的媒体数目可能不同；不同实例在接收你的posts时，可接收到的数目也可能不同——在给其他站点的用户分享图片时，还请注意这一点。

选择以纯文本或者是以Markdown格式的富文本发布您的帖子

GoToSocial可以支持完整的Markdown格式的文本输入。

配合支持Markdown渲染输出的网页前端or客户端，你可以获得最佳的刷信息流的体验！

自由地选择适合你的网页前端和客户端

GoToSocial使用了Mastodon的调用API，大多数支援Mastodon的网页前端或客户端也可以兼容GoToSocial，并实现出良好的使用效果。

与全世界绝大多数使用了白名单联通政策的Fediverse站点正确联通

meow.day是无任何不良行为记录的域名，并在本站设立前不久才刚刚被注册。暂时不会遇到因为被block产生的任何ActivityPub协议的连通性问题。

由于每个ActivityPub服务器实现对协议的解释略有不同，因此一些服务器与GoToSocial的联邦功能尚不完全兼容。GoToSocial的开发者正在尽全力保证此服务端的可连通性。

无任何心理负担地刷新你的时间线

GoToSocial不使用算法优化你的时间线信息流，你所能选择的时间线刷新方式就只有按最新发布的时间顺序排列。

与其他实例的不同之处：

相较于Mastodon，

GoToSocial不使用任何算法推荐

Mastodon中使用了推荐算法的探索栏目（包括热门贴文，话题标签，最新消息，推荐关注等）都不会在GoToSocial被实现，也不在开发者的Todolist中。

创立一个新账户后，用户默认的社交状态是”锁推/不开放RSS“；默认的贴文类型是”纯文 本/Unlisted状态“

当然，你可以在用户的设置面板中手动地将其设置为”不锁推/开放RSS/Markdown文本/Public状态“

在Federated时间轴的行为模式上，

不是去拉取一切已结交联邦的实例中的Public Posts (Mastodon的行为)，而是去拉取本站用户的的已 fo 用户的 Public Posts.

但是…

GoToSocial仍处于开发状态，很多功能仍然有待完善，like

  • edit功能尚未完善，也无法查看edited posts的edited后的内容。
  • 浏览器通知功能未完善，客户端对用户的通知只能通过定时拉取来实现。
  • Notification功能尚未完善，只有Tusky, Fedilab两款客户端能正常地给你发送通知。
  • ……
Short:
欢迎来到meow站(meow.day)！

meow.day是一个自由，开放，面向中文用户的GoToSocial实例。在这里你可以和Fediverse中不同背景，爱好的任何人友好地交流，而免于任何政府或大公司的言论审查。

meow.day的运营情况公开，你可以在本站管理员的嘟文列表中看到站点的运营状况的公示。

社区规则/管理公示/使用指南

👇请参考下面的"see more details"页面。

注册要求

本站暂行施行审批注册的方案，你可以在这里填写注册问卷。

已注册的用户便可前往站点主页探索你的Fediverse Timeline。

Description:
어서오세요. 이곳은 어디에나 있고, 어디에도 없는 섬.

영원한 미로에 발을 들이고 만 당신, 나갈 수 없다면 이곳의 생활에 적응하는 게 좋겠지요?

잃어버린 섬에서 지켜야할 것들

배려

  • 잃어버린 섬(Missing Island)은 자유로운 대화와 편안한 일상 공유를 위한 장소입니다. 항상 다른 사람을 배려하는 습관을 몸에 익히도록 합시다.
  • 배려하고 있다면 불특정 다수의 누군가가 자신의 신원으로 인해 불쾌하거나 상처 받는 말은 하지 말아야겠지요? 혐오와 차별이 담긴 발언은 금지됩니다.
  • 특정 대상을 조롱하거나 악성 비난을 하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 그럼에도 불구하고 사람은 이따금 화를 낼 필요가 있습니다. 그럴 때는 홈 공개 이하로 대상을 명확히 해주시기 바랍니다. 관련 없는 사람이 지나가다 뭇매 맞는 일이 없게 해주세요.
  • 내 글을 모두에게 보여주고 싶지 않을 수 있습니다. 그러나 나의 사생활이 타인을 재단하는 기준이 되어서는 곤란합니다. 일종의 차별이 될 수 있기 때문입니다. 팔로우 대상을 '명시적으로' 제한하는 것을 금지합니다.

안전

  • 타인의 정보를 수집하거나 감시하는 행위 혹은 이를 고지하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 협박, 상해, 자살, 테러 등을 예고하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 타인의 신상을 공개하거나 이를 빌미로 공격하는 모든 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 그 외의 불법적인 활동 및 내용 게시는 금지됩니다. 문제가 발생할 경우 정부 기관에게 게시자의 정보가 전달될 수 있습니다.

스팸 정책

  • 불법 성인 광고 등의 스팸 계정 및 게시글을 제한합니다.
  • 아티스트의 홍보를 환영합니다. 그러나 공개글 빈도가 지나칠 경우 제한될 수 있습니다.
  • 비상업성 홍보글의 경우 상기된 배려 및 안전 규칙에 어긋나지 않을 경우 제한되지 않습니다.

저작권 및 지적 재산권

  • 모든 게시글 및 첨부파일은 게시자에게 귀속됩니다.
  • 타인의 저작물을 무단 전재하는 것이 발각될 경우 게시글이 삭제될 수 있습니다.

MISSING ISLAND

  • 일회용 이메일을 사용한 가입을 금지합니다. 해당 사용자에게는 규칙 위반에 의한 조치가 전달되지 않기 때문에 운영상의 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  • 위 사항을 따르지 않을 경우 게시글 삭제, 공개범위 제한, 계정 정지 등의 제한 조치가 이뤄질 수 있습니다. 이의제기가 필요한 경우 메일로 연락주세요.
Short: 스스로 꿈꾸고, 어딘가로 떠날 수 있는 사람을 위한 장소입니다.

Description:
판돌토돈 서버는 마스토돈 서버 규약에 따르며 아래 내용이 추가됩니다.

나이 제한

판돌토돈은 만 16세 미만의 미성년자는 사용할 수 없습니다.

금지 사항

이 인스턴스에서는 아래 행위를 금지하고 있습니다.

  • 다음에 해당하는 컨텐츠를 NSFW / CW 표시 없이 로컬 타임라인에 포스팅하지 마십시오.
    • 과도한 성적 묘사・잔혹 묘사가 포함된 컨텐츠
    • 과도한 빛의 반짝임이 포함되어 일부 사용자가 발작을 일으킬 수 있는 컨텐츠
    • 그 외 다른 사용자가 불쾌함을 느낄 수 있는 과격한 내용의 컨텐츠
  • 다른 사용자에 대해 모욕, 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예 훼손의 목적으로 계정을 생성하거나 컨텐츠를 포스팅하지 마십시오.
    • 인종이나 성별, 성 정체・지향성 등에 대한 헤이트 스피치
    • 아동 포르노 또는 아동을 대상으로 한 학대가 담긴 컨텐츠
    • 사이버 불링
    • 불법 촬영물 등 디지털 성범죄에 해당하는 컨텐츠
  • 이 외에도, 다음 행위는 금지됩니다.
    • 광고 등 다른 사용자들이 원치 않는 목적의 무작위 팔로잉・멘션 행위 (스팸)
    • 일회용 이메일을 사용한 계정 생성
    • 신규 사용자에게 기존 사용자간의 문화를 강요하거나 행동을 재단하려는 행위

규칙을 크게 위반하지 않아도 과도한 욕설 등 다른 사용자들이 불쾌하게 여길 수 있는 내용으로 단시간에 여러 신고가 접수될 경우, 계정을 일시/영구적으로 침묵 (Silence) 처리 할 수 있습니다.

계정이 침묵 처리 되어도 기존처럼 마스토돈 사용은 가능하지만, 공개적으로 로컬 타임라인 / 연합 타임라인에 포스팅 하는 것이 불가능해지므로 유의 바랍니다.

처벌 제도 및 예외

과도한 문제로 인한 제재 대상이 아닌 경우 처벌 제도에 대해서는 아래와 같습니다.

사용자는 규칙을 어길 시 문제가 되는 콘텐츠 / 프로필을 삭제 처리하고 처벌을 받습니다.

처벌 수위는 담당 관리자의 판단하에 결정됩니다.

이의가 있으면 사용자는 jyp0036@gmail.com으로 공개 투표를 요청할 수 있습니다.

  • 예외

    • 아래에 해당하는 경우에는 예외를 적용하고, 곧바로 계정을 정지합니다.

  • 스팸 계정

    • 상기 나이 제한 사항에 해당하는 미성년자 사용자
    • username이 예외 사항에 해당하는 경우
    • 사용자 본인이나 다른 사용자들에게 커다란 신체적・정신적 피해가 초래될 수 있다고 판단되는 경우
    • 자해 및 자살 위험이 있거나 이를 조장하는 내용
    • 과도한 수위의 헤이트 스피치
    • 사이버 불링
    • 미성년・사회적 약자에 대한 공격 및 성적 접근 행위
    • 대한민국 내에서 불법으로 취급되는 정보를 담고 있는 경우
    • 웹 브라우저・접속 기기의 보안 취약점을 사용한 XSS나 이에 상응하는 공격 행위
    • Mastodon 시스템을 악용한 서비스 거부 공격 (DoS) 등의 공격 행위
    • 판돌토돈의 규칙의 허점을 악용한 악성 어뷰징 행위

  • 예외 (사일런스)

    • 판돌토돈 로컬 / 타 인스턴스의 여러 사용자에게 여러 차례 불쾌함을 주는 행위

자동화

  • 스크립트, 크로스포스터* 등의 자동화된 수단으로 Toot을 포스팅하는 자동화된 계정 (bot)의 가동은 허용하지 않으며 위반 시 예고 없이 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.

사용자의 데이터 열람 및 무단 사용 금지

판돌토돈의 관리자들은 관리 목적 외의 사유로 타인의 데이터를 무단으로 열람하거나 사용해선 안됩니다.

그러나, 아래에 해당하거나 정당한 사유가 있는 경우 부득이하게 데이터를 열람할 수 있으며 열람 시 해당 사용자 또는 전체에게 조회 사실 및 목적에 대해 공지해야 합니다.

  • 경찰 등 국가 수사 기관에 대한 협조를 위한 DB 조회
  • Mastodon 소프트웨어 업데이트 중 발생하는 문제 해결
  • DB / 스토리지 손상으로 인한 복구 작업
Short:
저희 서버의 목적은 게임, 그림, 방송등
주로 사이버 취미생활에 초점을 맞춘 서버입니다
